dang / /dkyil 'khor ris gsum mchod pa la/ /gdon rnams kyi ni gdon las mchog /gdon gyi gdon stobs rmugs bya dang / /nges par rtag tu bzlas bya bshad/ /bye ba
phrag stong gdon rnams ni/ /sa steng dag na rgyu ba yod/ /dus tshigs sna tshogs bab pa na/ /de dag rgyu ba sna tshogs pa/ /gdon mchog dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir/ /de dag bdag
gis bshad par bya/ /gdon rnams nyan par byed pa dang / /gtor ma len cing grub sbyin pa/ /de dag tshul dang gnas byas pa/ /dben pa dag tu rgyu
bar byed/ /ri bo yid du 'ong rnams dang / /rtse mo rnams dang khyim rnams dang / /'bras bu me tog rgyas rnams dang / /drang srong dag gi gnas rnams dang / /dka' thub tshal dang
gzhal med khang / /rig byed rjes su slob pa dang / /me tog sna tshogs mchod ldan dang / /gnas dang kun dga' yid 'ong dang / /bya rnams skad chen 'byin pa dang / /'jig
rten mar me byed kun dang / /nyi ma'i gnas na dga' byed cing / /nyi ma lhan cig 'gro bar byed/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang kha dog mnyam/ /gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma la/ /de dag
rtag tu rgyu bar byed/ /zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer gyi/ /phung po rgyas pa dag la gnas/ /rin chen kun gyis rab brgyan cing / /rtse nas ngos ni lda ldi dang / /phug brgya dag gis gang
ba yin| |lhun po ri la de dag gnas/ /gangs ri ri bo'i rtse mo dang / /gangs kyi sul ni stong pa dang / /sman kun gyis ni rgyas pa yi/ /gsang rnams dang ni nags tshal dang / /
sman rgyas yongs su gang ba yin/ /spos ngad ldan la de dag gnas/ /spos kyi ngad ni zhim pa mi/ /phyogs rnams dang ni rgyas byed dang / /dpag bsam shing gis brgyan
pa yi| |skyed mos tshal chen dga' byed dang / /lha rnams gzhal med khang rnams su/ /lha yi gzugs kyis gnas par byed/ /de dag sprin phung gseb na gnas/ /sprin
phung gi ni sgra dag 'dra/ /sprin phung dag dang 'grog byed cing / /sprin phung lhan cig dga' bar byed/ /rgya mtsho nang gi chu la gnas/ /chu yi shugs kyis rjes 'brang zhing / /de dag
rgya mtsho'i chu klung dang / /lhan cig tu ni rgyu bar byed/ /mun nag gi ni klog chen dang / /rgya mtsho yi ni sgra rnams dang / /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa la/ /de dag rtag tu 'khrugs
par byed/ /dpyid zla'i dus la bab pa na/ /shing rnams kun la gdon de dag /khu byug bung ba'i gzugs su gnas/ /chu klung chen po'i 'gram dag na/ /gling ma rnams
dang rdzong rnams dang / /chu dmar dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /'jing rnams na ni gnas par byed/ /chu rgyun yid du 'ong ba dang / /chu rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang / /khron pa rnam pa sna
tshogs dang / /ri bo dag dang chu rnams dang / /sbrul gyi tshogs kyis gang ba yi/ /nags khung chen po dag na yang / /de dag sbrul du gzugs bsgyur nas/ /sbrul dang lhan cig
dga' bar byed/ /ljon shing chen po mi bzad dang / /'byung po dag ni tshogs chen dang / /khang stong dang ni yul stong dang / /ba lang gnas ni gang ba dang / /rgyal po dag gis
dkor khang dang / /pad+ma rnams dang gzhan dag kyang / /glang chen gnas ni yid 'ong dang / /rta rnams kyi ni bres dag dang / /gzhan yang grong khyer
rnams dang gzhan/ /tshong dus dag na gnas par byed/ /chang 'thung gnas dang khyim dang gzhan/ /srang dang lam dang shing rta dang / /rgyu ba dag gi gnas rnams dang / /
bu mo la sogs lta ba'i rnams/ /skyed mos tshal rnying mi bzad dang / /lha yi gnas ni zhigs pa dang / /bu btsa' ba yi gnas gzhan dang / /'chi la thug pa'i khyim
dag dang / /dga' ston sa dang 'dus pa dang / /'dus ston sa dang 'thab mo'i sa/ /g.yul gyi sa ni thams cad ni/ /gdon rnams rtag tu gnas par byed/ /drug cu rtsa
bzhi'i gdon bshad pa/ /yid ltar mgyogs shing 'dod rgur 'gro/ /'dod rgyur sgyur ba'i gzugs can de/ /thams cad rang dgar rtsen par byed/ /lha tshogs ma
mo'i gdon drug bcas/ /tshangs pa srung bar byed pa ste/ /bar snang gza' ni nyi ma yang / /gdon rnams kyi ni gtso bor bshad/ /skem byed la sogs srin po'i bar/ /
rdzong ldan ma dang klu gnyis dang / /srin po bcu dang lha mo dang / /nor bu 'grul ni bar ma yin/ /grul bum la sogs yi dwags dang / /brjed byed bcas dang srul por
bcas| |mdangs 'phrog de bzhin smyo byed dang / /thams cad gdon gyi tha mar bshad/ /de dag gi ni khyad par bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor mngon par mchod byas nas/ /mngon
par dga' bar bya ba yi/ /bstod pas mchod pa dag kyang bya/ /dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mched
par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste bsreg bya bzhes pa'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag
kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang ba'i lha/ /sa yi bdag po gdon gyi bdag /brab sems bdag nyid gdon bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden
dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i bdag po gdon gyi bdag /sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu
yi lha| |bden pa srung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig srung gdon gyi
bdag po ste/ /rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin lag na be con thogs/ /nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang
phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag
dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu dang che ba'i lha/ /rgyal po chen po glang po che/ /dam tshig shes pa'i gdon
bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang / /zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang / /gza' skar rgyu skar bcas pa dang / /skar ma'i
'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dang / /rig sngags tshogs dang gsang sngags dang / /de bzhin phyag rgya'i tshogs kun dang / /dam tshig shes dang slob dpon dang / /tshangs
pa la sogs lha chen dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa tshe yi lha/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /gtum po 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag /'jigs byed lag na rdo rje thogs/ /thams
cad zhi bar byed pa ste/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni kun gyis mchod/ /rnam pa kun gyis 'byung po kun/ /dus kun du ni srung ba po/ /rig sngags bcas pa de dag dang / /
'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad la/ /bshos dang dri sogs sna tshogs rnams/ /des ni dga' zhing dbul bar bya/ /dam tshig shes pa rnams dang ni/ /'byung po'i
tshogs kyis bdag la srungs/ /de yi rgyas pa 'phel ba dang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad par gsol/ /sna tshogs tshig gis smra bar bya/ /zhi ba'i tshig ni yang dang
yang / /bdag gi bla ma'am yang na gzhan/ /dam tshig shes pa gzhan gyis byas/ /'di ni 'byung po kun la phan phyir bshad pa ste/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun 'dus la
rtag tu mchod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag las gtor ma'i las ni rgyas pa 'di/ /rgyu ba dag gi gnas dang rten gyur dpal bskyed phyir/ /'dir ni thams cad dus su phyogs
rnams thams cad du/ /yongs su dag pa'i yid dang rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /thams cad zhi bar byed pa gsum du rab bshad pa/ /don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir ni bla mas
bya ba yin/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// //kun rig sems kun gyis mchod/ /rig sngags bdag po kun gyis rjed/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i sangs
rgyas ni| |rnam gsum nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan/ /mtshan med mang po mnga' ba ste/ /'od ma gang 'od chen 'chang ba dang / /rig sngags ston pa chen po ste/ /mchod chen 'chang
zhing sbyin byed dang / /dag pa'i chos ni des gsungs pa/ /zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi ba'i lam/ /gang gis thub rnams shes pa dang / /gzhan yang sngon gshegs gshegs
gyur dang / /ya mtshan gnas ldan dge 'dun rnams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong 'jug pa/ /shin tu rgyas pa de kun la/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal
zhing / /thub pa sangs rgyas gnyis pa ni/ /'phags pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ /lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ /klu dang gnod sbyin tshigs kyis mchod/ /de bzhin dam pa grub pa
ste| |rig sngags 'chang kun dbang phyug rje/ /dpa' bo gcig pu dgra thul ba//lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu yum/ /rdo rje thog thog bzang mo dang / /
de nas lag na rdo rje'i mthus/ /ki li ki li gtum po dang / /rdo rje sgrog gi nyi ma bzhin/ /blo gros rdo rje phas mi thub/ /'og dpag khro bo dril bu can/ /de bzhin rdo rje nag mo
la| |ci ste shes rab can dag gis/ /gzhan don grub par 'dod pa na/ /mchod cing phyag kyang byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gzung bya legs par bshad/ /grub pa lag na
rdo rje yi| |dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed cing / /dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa/ /ji skad du ni rab bstan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ci 'dra gang yin dang / /de yi yon tan
sna tshogs gang / /tshogs kyang ji ltar bstan pa dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dam tshig dang / /cho ga dam pa grub pa dang / /phan dang mi phan don rnams dang / /dam tshig
shes pa'i yon tan dang / /nyams pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa/ /de dang gzhan yang gang mthong ba/ /de dag thams cad legs par bshad/ /lag na rdo rje'i sras gtum pa/ /rdo rje
sde la phyag byas nas/ /zla phyed yud tsam zhag gcig dang / /rgyu skar dag ni bzang ba la/ /gtsang zhing gso gtsang bgos pa dang / /bsngams shing nges par gnas pa dang / /
grogs po gtsang mar ldan pa dang / /gtsang ma'i las kyi rjes 'brang bas/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig gam/ /tshes gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung / /tshes drug dang ni brgyad dang
bcu| |bcu gnyis yang na bcu gsum mam/ /yang na nya yi nyin par ni/ /yongs su gzung bar bya ba ste/ /de dag brtsam gyi gzhan la min/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs byas
la| |zla ba nya yi nub mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya/ /bsgrims te lag na rdo rje dang / /rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas/ /zhi zhing sngon chad las byas pa'i/ /sar ni
mkhas pas 'gro bar bya/ /tshong dus kun dga' gtsug lag khang / /grong ngam yang na grong khyer gyi/ /byang shar mtshams ni gang mthong ba/ /de yi lho nub mtshams dag
tu| |zla ba re re brtul zhugs bya/ /mdangs dga' tshal ldan gtsang ma dang / /tshwa sgo rdo gseg rus pa dang / /mtho dman skyon rnams rnam spangs pa/ /de 'dra'i de rnyed na
ni| |rdo rje lcags kyu dran byas la/ /shar phyogs nas ni gom pa'i 'dor/ /ha cang mi drag dgod mi bya/ /de nas rig sngags gang 'dod pas/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /
de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang / /dge ba'i ltas rnams blta bar bya/ /sngags kyis btab pa'i chu dag gis/ /thams cad legs par gtor bar bya/ /ba lang lci
bas legs par sbyar/ /ku sha dag kyang gding bar bya/ /mnyam pa'i dbus kyi dkyil dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor byed pa 'dug nas ni/ /phyogs mtshams steng dang thad kar
yang / /kho ra khor yug blta bar bya/ /srung zhing yid dga' dri dag gis/ /khrus byas zhag gsum smyung bar bya/ /spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bzhin du/ /spos kyis phyogs
kun rgyas par bya/ /thig skud gser zhing rab gtsang dang / /tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang / /dri zhim reg na 'jam pa dang / /sra zhing legs par gzab pa dang / /
thung dang sbom sogs ma legs dang / /mdud pa rnams ni med pa yis/ /thig ni shes rab can gyis gdab/ /de yi tshad kyang bshad par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen dga' ba
yi/ /dang po'i gnas ni rdzogs gyur nas/ /de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor che/ /grangs rnams kyang ni bshad par bya/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
rgyal po ste gnas dang po'i// //bu dag chog shes dben pa bde/ /chos la mi smod bde ba yin/ /'tshe ba spangs pas 'jig rten bde/ /srog chags rnams la sdom
ba dang / /'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde/ /'dod chags rnams las 'dus pa dang / /nga snyam rgyal zhi ba dang / /dul ba 'di ni mchog tu bde/ /bu dag rgyun las
ldog pa yi/ /lam bgrod zab cing blta dka' ba/ /mun nag thibs pos bsgribs pa dang / /'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /ngas ni dka' bas rtogs byas nas/ /skye
bo rgyun bzhin 'khyams pa dang / /'dod pa dag gi mdud pa yis/ /bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste/ /'di ni lag na rdo rje yi/ /yid 'ong ched du brjod pa brjod/ /rtsed mo can gyis
bsrungs byas nas/ /nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med/ /dkyil 'khor khru ni bcu drug tu/ /ci nas rab tu tshang bar bya/ /srid du yang ni ci nas kyang / /sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa dang / /
gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos la/ /thig skud de ni bdag gis gzung / /lha la dga' ba'i grogs po yis/ /kho ra khor yug drang bar bya/ /thig grangs de yi steng dag tu/ /
thig ni snyoms par legs par bri/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rmad du byung ba de nyid brjod/ /thub chen gnas par gyur pa yi/ /khor yug dag ni rgya che ba/ /rang byung gis
ni bstan pa bzhin/ /blo can dag gis zlum por bya/ /thung spom la sogs skyon bral zhing / /thig ni legs shing snyoms par bya/ /spom tshes pa ni
sngar bshad zin/ /thung ches pas ni nad kyis 'debs/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas/ /de ni yungs kar dag gis bris/ /gang zhig tsan+dan phye mas 'bri/ /
des ni 'jig rten nges par 'joms/ /nas rnams kyi ni ma 'dres pa'i/ /sA lu bzang por byas na ni/ /de yi nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /dbyig rnams rtag tu 'phel bar
'gyur| |gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas/ /der ni gsum char gyis kyang bri/ /yang na de dag gcig pu yis/ /shes rab can gyis bri bar bya/ /de nas ri yi rgyal
po ni| |rin chen kun nas grub pa ste/ /nyi ma bzhin du rtag tu yang / /rang gi 'od kyis rab 'bar zhing / /bang rim yod pa'i ri rab de/ /thog ma nyid du gzhag par bya/ /
sngar bstan pa yi khor yug ni/ /gru bzhi tshad du bya ba yin/ /de nyid khongs su rim pa gsum/ /khu re tsam du bri bar bya/ /gzhan yang mtho ni do do dang / /sor bzhi bcas par
bri bar bya/ /gnyis pa dang ni lhag ma rnams/ /cha drug mdzes dang ldan par bya/ /gzhan ni mtshams la thugs pa'i bar/ /ci rigs par ni bri bar bya/ /du 'bod chen
po zhes bya ba'i/ /dmyal ba bden bral phyogs su gzhag /bstan pa bzhin du de byas nas/ /gzhan yang bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /ras gsar ba ni sA lu 'am/ /tsan+dan bzang
po'i phye ma yis/ /rdo rje srid du khru gang pa/ /rtse drug yang na rtse gsum bri/ /de yang ci ste mi 'byor na/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag gis/ /sor bzhi tsam du bya ba yin/ /gang
gis gdon ni stong phrag rnams/ /khyad par 'dir ni sgrub byed pa/ /de nyid 'jig rten gsum dag gi /'jigs byed drag po yin par nges/ /de nyid ngo mtshar bye ba snyed/ /ya
mtshan rnams kyang ston pa yin/ /gcig tu rdo rje gnyis ldan pa/ /de nyid nyi ni drug dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi po dag /byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga bya/ /bden dang
gtor ba rgya che ba/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba ya mtshan ldan/ /yang na gang gis 'di dag kun/ /thub pa'i shes rab byin brlab bya/ /bden dang nges pa gnas byas nas/ /bden bral
phyogs su bri ba dang / /chu lha'i phyogs su song nas kyang / /rgya chen don rnams bya ba na/ /si ta ku ni bu dang bcas/ /bzhi ba de ni legs par gnas/ /grong khyer mchog gi drug
dag tu| |gru ni byang phyogs blta bar bya/ /de nas 'jug par rab bstan de/ /dkyil 'khor dag pa gzhan mi bya/ /gzugs gnas sgo mchog de nyid ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dgye
pa yin| |dkyil 'khor 'dod pa gang yin pa/ /de yi sgo yi byang phyogs drung / /lho phyogs kyi ni drung dag tu/ /bstan pa gang yin gzhag par bya/ /
gur gum yid du 'ong ba dang / /ldan pa'i rgya skyegs khu ba dang / /le brgan rtsi yis bsgyur ba yi/ /sar ni dmar zhing yid 'ong ba/ /bug rdol med cing ma nyams la/ /
dri nga ba dag med pa yi/ /gdan dag kyang ni nges byas shing / /shing ring la ni legs par gdags/ /de nas logs shig rtse mo yi/ /cha byad sna tshogs khyad par du/ /
rnam par mdzes pa gzhag bya ste/ /rgya skyegs las ni legs byas pa'i/ /pho long chen po ri mo can/ /gzhan yang dril dang sgo nga'i dbyibs/ /ste 'u 'khor gyi tshogs
rnams dang / /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /ku ran+ta ka'i me tog phreng / /rgyal mtshan rtse mor 'phyang du gzhug /yang na me tog dmar ba yi/ /phreng ba bzang po sna
tshogs gdags/ /de dag bstan pas shes pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol gzhag /de nas ri dbang 'khor yug gi /nang du yang ni 'gro bar bya/ /de ltar mtshungs
med ces bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab pa/ /gnas gnyis pa ni rgyas par bstan/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ gnas gnyis
pa rdzogs so// //rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rmad du byung ba de dran zhing / /g.yon phyogs dag tu go rim bzhin/ /lha rnams kyang ni dgod par bya/ /chu lha'i phyogs
kyi sgo dag ni/ /kar+Sha pa na brgyad dag gi /'gron bu rnams ni shar nub tu/ /mnyam zhing mdzes par dgod par bya/ /de yi lho phyogs rdo rje yi/ /rig sngags bla ma'i rigs
rnams dgod/ /de ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rig sngags rgyal po dbus su gzhag /dregs shing stobs kyis rgyags pa yi/ /sngon po chen po sngon po gnyis/ /der ni rig sngags
rigs rnams kyi/ /sgo srung dag tu gzhag par bya/ /rig sngags rdo rje'i rigs skyes rnams/ /shar phyogs su ni blta bar bya/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje dang por bshad/ /rdo rje khro bo
mjug tu gzhag /me tog yid 'ong rtse mo can/ /lug rgyud gtum mo ser mo rnams/ /pho nya ma dag grangs bzhin du/ /thams cad de yi pha rol dgod/ /bung ba ma dang lta ba
ma| |dga' ma thub dka' byang phyogs gzhag /rdo rje ka ta ya na dang / /'di dag g.yas phyogs bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sde yi 'khor rnams kyang / /de yi lho phyogs dgod par bya/ /de
nas klu rgyal nor rgyas bu/ /bzhi pa dag la gzhag par bya/ /'byung po sna tshogs bskor ba yi/ /gzhon nu tshogs dang bcas pa yang / /dkyil 'khor lnga par gzhag par bya//
mdung thung yang ni mdun du gzhag /de nas drug la bden bral phyogs/ /'byung po rings byed mi bzad pa/ /'phags pa yi ni mdun bris la/ /'phags
ma yin ni mdun du gzhag /ma mo rnams kyi rigs lnga po/ /tshangs ma dang ni dbang phyug ma/ /skem byed khyab 'jug phag mo zhes/ /bya ba dkyil 'khor bdun par
gzhag /grong khyer de yi nang dag tu/ /chu klung 'gram dang ldan par bri/ /gra rnams shar byang gra dag dang / /lho dang nub phyogs phyin par bya/ /sdig can chun gnas pa'i nang //
ngoms mi shes pa'i ri dwags shig /nang du mchu btsugs phyogs gcig gnas/ /de nang khyu mchog 'gro bar bya/ /rlung lha'i phyogs kyi gnas gcig tu/ /bde byed lha
mo khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin ra dang bum rna gnyis/ /grong khyer gyi ni sgo srung gzhag /klung gi g.yas rol 'gram dag tu/ /rig sngags chen mo bu smad bcas/ /dbang
ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor bdun pa 'das pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa sngar bshad pa'i/ /'byung po'i bya ba sgrub pa bdun/ /'byung po sna tshogs
bskor ba gzhag /dgu par yang ni rim bzhin bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bcu par ni/ /tshangs pa'i drang srong rnams kyang gzhag /de nas gshin rje tshogs mang
bcas| |bcu gcig par ni gzhag par bya/ /me lce lha yi tshogs kyis bskor/ /me de mthu las skyes pa ste/ /de ni bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /yi dwags rnams kyi 'khor
dang bcas/ /yi dwags dag kyang gzhag par bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /de ni bcu gsum shes par bya/ /zla ba phyogs bzang stobs po che/ /khyab 'jug dbang po
nye dbang gnyis/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi/ /blo gros lha mo gnyis kyang gzhag /gang na lha dbang gnyis gnas pa/ /de ni bcu bzhir shes par bya/ /bco lnga pa yi
dkyil 'khor du/ /klu chen rigs brgyad dgod par bya/ /bka' stsol pa zhes bya ba yi/ /tshangs pa'i srin rnams bcu drug tu/ /bcu bdun pa yi dkyil 'khor du/ /ka ta ya na
gzhag par bya/ /de yi 'khor ni gang yin pa/ /de yang drung du gzhag par bya/ /dbang phyug chen mo chung mar bcas/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste/ /de ni bco brgyad
shes par bya/ /de nas phyi rol rig sngags rigs/ /rig sngags kyi ni sna tshogs dge /bcu dgu par ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas kyang ni rig sngags rnams/ /ming smos 'di
dag la sogs bri/ /dri gshed thabs kyis dri gshed dang / /ro langs mar ni grags pa dang / /dkar mo chen mo dkar mo dang / /gzhan yang sa steng gnas rnams gzhag /
rdo rje'i mnga' bdag dges pa yi/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags mchog 'ching ba/ /rab tu gsal zhing 'bar ba de/ /dbus der mkhas pas gzhag
par bya| |de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen rje/ /nyi shu par ni gzhag par bya/ /gang na rdo rje 'dzin gnas te/ /ming ni rdo rje pho brang yin/ /nyi shu gcig pa'i byang phyogs su/ /ku pe ra
ni tshogs bcas bri/ /ku be ra ni gar gnas pa/ /grong khyer lcang lo can zhes bya/ /klu yi bya ba bsgrub pa brgyad/ /grong khyer nyi shu gnyis par gzhag /bya ba sgrub bcas klu
chen rnams/ /lnga po nyi shu gsum par gzhag /dkyil 'khor nyis hu rtsa bzhir ni/ /klu yi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /klu mgo yi ni gdengs ka can/ /klu chen gyis ni
g.yas su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nang dag tu/ /klu chen kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang / /de bzhin nor bu la sogs klu/ /kal pa la dang rab
mgyogs gnyis/ /de bzhin gzhan yang klu rnams kyis/ /ma dang rgyal tshab 'jog po yang / /dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya/ /shar sgo 'od ma'i rtse mo gzhag /
dga' skyed pa ni lho phyogs su/ /nub phyogs su ni legs mthong gzhag /byang phyogs su ni stobs kyis rgyu/ /de nas rlung lha'i phyogs dag tu/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni
bdun rnams dgod/ /de ni nyi shu lnga pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor du yang grags pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /'di dag kyang ni mkhas pa yis/ /ci rigs par ni bri
bya zhing / /rdzogs byed rnams kyang legs par bri/ /chu lha'i phyogs su nyi ma bri/ /shar phyogs su ni zla ba gzhag /ka ru na ni gling bzhir ni/ /phyogs mtshams dag tu
gzhag par bya/ /lhag ma dag ni byang phyogs su/ /nges par yang ni dgod par bstan/ /'di dag rnams ni mdor bsdu na/ /'khor yug gi ni khong nas dbyung / /de nas rdo rje
shugs kyis ni/ /der ni stobs chen 'gro bar bya/ /bang rim la ni song nas kyang / /dang po legs par dgod par bya/ /rdzong gi 'phags ma don sgrub pa/ /dur khrod gnas
drag mo ni/ /bden bral phyogs su gzhag bya zhing / /ma yang drung du gzhag par bya/ /phyogs kyi lha ni bye ba rnams/ /dbang ldan phyogs su dgod par bya/ /log 'dren drag po
chen po yang / /dkyil 'khor du ni legs par dgod/ /rlung lha'i phyogs su mkha' lding gzhag /de nas dang po skyong ba yi/ /rdzong gi 'phags ma gnyis pa yang / /yongs su
rdzogs par gzhag par bya/ /bang rim dag ni gnyis pa la/ /rdo rje shugs kyis bsgom bya zhing / /klu rigs nor bu gzhag par bya/ /mtha' yas bden bral phyogs su
gzhag /de nas phyogs kyi lha nyid ni/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su legs par gzhag /de nas yi dwags tshogs rnams kyang / /me yi phyogs su gzhag
par bya| |de nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /yi dwags kyi ni rigs rnams dgod/ /brjed byed kyi ni rigs rnams dang / /nam gru dag gi rigs kyang gzhan/ /dbang ldan
'byung po rnams dang ni/ /'byung po'i chang khyu rnams kyang gzhag /tshangs pa'i srin po zhes bya rnams/ /dkyil 'khor byang phyogs dgod par bya/ /phyi rol klu yi rigs
rnams kyang / /rlung lha'i phyogs su legs par dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa las/ /bang rim 'di ni yongs su rdzogs/ /rdo rje rim gyis bsgoms nas ni/ /
gsum pa yang ni bden bral phyogs/ /sha za bzhag ste song na yang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khro gzhag /yi drags kyi ni khyim rnams kyang / /gshin
rje'i phyogs su legs par dgod/ /me yi phyogs su dkyil 'khor du/ /stobs chen lha ma yin rnams gzhag /de nas dpal ldan 'jig rten skyong / /'jig rten chos
las phyir phyogs pa/ /yul 'khor srung ni dpag med pa'i/ /dri zar lhan cig kun tu dgod/ /dbang phyug chen mor bcas pa yi/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gnas par
bya| |de nas rig sngags rnams kyi bdag/ lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ /grogs bcas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /rdo rje pho brang dga' bar gzhag /de nas stobs chen 'jig
rten skyong / /dpal ldan 'jig rten chos spangs pa/ /lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /dbang ldan byang gi phyogs su gzhag /de bzhin lcang lo can dag tu/ /nor sbyin tshogs
dang bcas par bri/ /klu rnams ma ni su ru sa/ /rlung lha'i phyogs su gnas par bya/ /de dag bu dang bcas par ni/ /de yi drung du dgod par bshad/ /mkha' lding rnam
par 'dud pa'i bu/ /mthu rtsal shin tu rdzogs pa'ang gzhag /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dgod/ /chu lha yang ni nub phyogs gzhag /gsum pa dag kyang 'das pa
yi| |bzhi pa dag gis bshad par bya/ /bang rim bzhi pa'i steng dag tu/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /nyi ma rnams ni g.yog dang bcas/ /chu lha'i phyogs su gnas
par bya| |bden bral phyogs su srin rnams dgod/ /de yi pha rol grul bum gzhag /de nas grul bum lcags can yang / /lho phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /me yi phyogs
su rlung lha gzhag /shar phyogs zla ba 'khor dang bcas/ /thag bzang ris kyang de bzhin te/ /de gnyis kyis ni bzhi pa dgang / /de nas bang rim ldan pa la/ /rdo rje shugs
kyis 'gro bar bya/ /lha bsrung phyir ni klu rnams kyang / /chu lha'i phyogs su dgod par bya/ /dbang ldan dang ni shar mtshams su/ /lha yi mdzod kyang
gzhag par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje che/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje'i drung dag tu/ /gnas gtsang rigs kyi lha chen gzhag /lha yi srung
ma gnod sbyin che/ /byang phyogs dag tu gnas par bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis drug pa la/ /song nas chu lha'i phyogs dag tu/ /klu rgyal rgya mtsho chen po'i bu/ /drag cing
shugs dang ldan pa gzhag /der ni g.yog dang bcas par bya/ /gzhan dag gis ni sprul pa la/ /dbang byed la ni gang yin rnams/ /bden bral phyogs su
gnas par bya/ /tshangs ris kyi ni tshogs rnams kyang / /me yi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa yi/ /lha rnams shar phyogs gzhag
par bya/ /shin tu mthong lha dbang ldan du/ /srid rtse de yi pha rol dgod/ /de bzhin dka' zlog byang phyogs gzhag /drug pa dag kyang 'das pa yin/ /bang rim
dag ni bdun pa la/ /rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje 'chang / /song nas klu yi gtso po ni/ /rgya mtsho chen po rmad byung gzhag /byang phyogs bya ba zin nas ni/ /grags shing
bsod nams che ba yi/ /'phrul dga' ba yi lha chen rnams/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su gnas par bya/ /de nas rdo rje shar phyogs kyi/ /gnas kyi gtso bor gzhag par
bya| |sum cu gsum pa'ang shar phyogs su/ /gzhag cing bdun pa yongs su dgang / /lha rnams sna tshogs rgyas pa yis/ /ri yi dbang po dam pa yi/ /bang rim dag ni
yongs su rdzogs/ /de yi 'og tu bya ba bshad/ /ri rab steng du thams cad mkhyen/ /rig sngags snying po 'chang ba po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs mdzad pa/ /thar pa'i
grong khyer dbang phyug gzhan/ /gang gi 'od zer de dag gis/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rgyas mdzad dang / /gang gis sku la mtshan kun gyi/ /mdzod rnams thams cad
'byung ba dang / /mtshan dang gzhon dang brtson 'grus dang / /gzhan yang zhi bar ldan pa dang / /mchog rnams mchog sbyin byed pa la/ /gang gis mchog gi mchog sbyin
dang / /thugs rje che dang ldan pa'i mgon/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra/ /'od zer nyi ma bye ba yis/ /gang gis mun pa bsal ba dang / /chos dang mtshan nyid rig pa yi/ /
yid bzhin nor bu'i thugs mnga' gang / /gang gis bskal pa grangs med par/ /sems can rnams ni rab tu bsrungs/ /rin chen in+d+ra nI la ltar/ /gang gi gtsug tor
mdzes pa dang / /nor bu yi ni rgyal po bzhin/ /zla mdog can gyi mdzod srung na/ /gang gi bdud rtsi gtor ba'i zhal/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra
dang / /dus mtshams gser gyis bsgyur ba yi/ /gser gyi ri ltar sku mdog mdzes/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs stong pas/ /phyag dang zhabs ni legs spras pa/ /
skyil mo krung ni mdzes pa yis/ /thub pa chen po legs par bzhugs/ /chos kyi chu klung chen po'i mchog /de yi zhal nas kun tu 'bab/ /rmad du byung bar 'bab pa ste//
bdag gis kha ni stong phrag rnams/ /stong snyed kyis ni brjod pa 'am/ /khong du chud par nus mi 'gyur/ /de ni rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / /ye shes pha mtha' bla na med//
shin tu rmad byung gsang bar bshad/ /tshig ldan gyi ni lha mo de/ /'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsung la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum na bdag
mchog sbyin/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /'di ni gnas dang 'gro ba yi/ /'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa yin/ /che ba'i che mchog stobs chen te/ /
dga' zhing kun gyi tshig la gnas/ /gzhan gcig sangs rgyas 'dra bar med/ /gud na yang ni gnas ma yin/ /de yi bsngags pa sangs rgyas sam/ /lha rnams
nyid kyis brjod par nus/ /mchog sbyin 'jig rten gsum gyi ma/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mdor na 'gro ba 'di kun ni/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin nyid yin te/ /
lha dang dri za klu dbang dbang / /gnod sbyin lha min tshogs bskor ba'i/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi gter/ /ya mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /der gtogs der ni brtson
zhing spro/ /de dang 'brel bar the tshom med/ /chos klung bsod nams ldan pa de/ /bsod nams rin chen dag gis rgyas/ /lag na rdo rje'i bsod nams kyis/ /las kyi rgya mtsho
dag las 'byung / /chu klung rgya mtshor 'bab pa na/ /skye bos bsten nas 'bab par 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos kyi chu klung 'di/ /'di dag gis bsten byas nas kyang / /lag na rdo
rje'i mgo bo dang / /rna gnyis dang ni gsum du dbab/ /zer ma 'phros pas lha mo dang / /dbang phyug tshogs bcas phog par 'gyur/ /de phyir chos kyi chu klung 'di/ /sangs
rgyas las ni 'byung byas la/ /lag na rdo rje'i mgo bor yang / /rab tu dbab cing bdug par bya/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i chu klung rgya chen de nyid las/ /skye bo mtha' dag gcig tu
sems btud nyan par byed/ /de nyid la ni lha rnams thams cad mngon par dga'/ /de nyid la ni rig sngags grub pa'i tshogs kun brten/ /gnas rnams gsum pa 'di ni
lha yi gnas yin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yi dgongs pa bzhin du rdzogs/ /de nas dam tshig mkhyen pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi/ /gsang ba gang dang
gang gsungs dga' rgyas bdag gis bshad/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ gnas gsum pa rdzogs so// //
ri rab kyi ni byang phyogs su/ /chos kyi klung chen 'dzin pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen rab gtum pa/ /stobs chen lag na rdo rje gzhag /de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /dbang
phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pa yi ni rkang pa yis/ /lha mo dka' zlog mnan par bya/ /ri yi dbang po 'khor yug dang / /bang rim dag gi bar dag tu/ /gling
chen rnam pa bzhi po dang / /gnas rnams ji bzhin gzhag par bya/ /de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag /lho phyogs su ni dbyibs legs pa'i/ /'dzam bu gling ni
gzhag par bya/ /chu klung dang ni shing dang yul/ /sna tshogs kyis ni shin tu rgyas/ /de yi mngon mtshan chen po ni/ /'dzam bu'i shing mchog skyes pa de/ /'phang du
dpag tshad brgya yod do/ /'og logs su ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag /nags tshal yang ni bdun dag dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i ri bdun dang //
yul bdun dag kyang gzhag par bya/ /dang po byang nas brtsam bya zhing / /lho phyogs logs su thur du drang / /shar nas nub tu drang bya zhing / /kho ra khor yug bsgrubs nas
ni| |rgyal ba'i gsung rab yid 'ong ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes sgrub pa/ /'phags pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid pad+ma'i mchog /dge slong dge slong ma rnams
dang / /rgyal po dag gis bsten pa gzhag /'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogs su/ /'khri shing dag kyang bri bar bya/ /nub phyogs su ni ba lang spyod/ /chu bo brgyas ni gang ba dang //
yul dang skye bo stong dag dang / /ba lang khyu ni stong gis rgyas/ /de bzhin shar gyi lus 'phags kyang / /shar phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /yul rnams su ni gzhag par
bya| |yul rnams dang ni ri dag gis/ /kun tu rab tu rgyas par gnas/ /de nas gnas brtan chos skyong ba/ /bcu gnyis dag dang lhan cig tu/ /sgra gcan 'dzin zhes grags
pa ste| |sangs rgyas sras ni mngon sum gnas/ /gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye rnams/ /nyin mtshan du ni der song nas/ /dri dang phreng ba dpe med pas/ /mchod pa byed cing phyag
kyang 'tshal/ /de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po yi ni byang phyogs gzhag /gtsang zhing gru bzhi lham pa ste/ /chu klung dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /gang dag gi ni tshe yi
tshad| |chig stong tshang par brjod pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs pa yi/ /sems can ya mtshan de na gnas/ /rgya mtsho'i sa ni bskor ba
yi| |ri yi dam pa ri rab la/ /phyogs kyi lha ni bzhi po rnams/ /kun nas nges par gzhag par bya/ /kaR+sha pa na brgyad dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor dang por rdo rje bri/ /de yi
gnas rnams de dag tu/ /gser gyi gdu bu dag kyang bya/ /sgo rnams re rer don grub pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /thub par nus pa gang yin pa'i/ /sgo srung
gnyis kyang gzhag par bya/ /de yang sngags dang ldan bya zhing / /kun tu gzhal yas rgyas par bya/ /rdo rje thog thog lho phyogs bri/ /rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs gzhag /de
nas der ni lha bshos rnams/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba dang / /bla med rab mdzes rgyas par bya/ /dri dang me tog phreng bas mchod/ /zhib de'i thu lu sna tshogs pa/ /sbrang rtsis
byugs shing gzab pa dang / /legs byas a shwa ka brti/ /de bzhin be reg nas khur dbul/ /ji tsam du ni rgyas pa phul/ /de tsam du ni 'grub par bshad/ /'bras
kyi po thug tshu la ka /thug pa sbyar thug sa mi ta/ /'bras can tshod ma sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog sna tshogs sor lngar ldan/ /de la sogs pa gang 'dod pa/ /lo ma sna
tshogs skyon med pa/ /yang na kham phor gsar pa 'am/ /pad+ma'i lo ma dag la gzhag /nas dang gro dang mon sran gre'u/ /sA lu dang ni til 'bru rnams/ /snod gsar dag
gi nang du gzhag /yang na gzhan du de bzhin gzhag /hwags dang kha ras gang ba dang / /btung ba bsil zhing zhim pa dag /snod gsar dag gi nang dag tu/ /bzhag nas rab
tu dbul bar bya/ /des na su la'ang 'tshe mi 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis za 'dod la/ /kha zas dag kyang sbyin par bya/ /de nas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ta la'i lo ma
bsil yab dbul/ /dri zhim pa yi dri kun gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/ /spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs pa/ /mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhin mchod/ /dza ya mu sa na
la sogs/ /dri zhim thams cad sbyar bas mchod/ /a ga ru dang du ru ka /shing gi thang chu gsar sbyar rnams/ /bdug pa'i rgyur ni bsngags pa yin/ /dngos grub sgo drung
'dug par bya/ /yang na nang du song nas ni/ /de ni byang phyogs kha blta zhing / /lag na rdo rje tshul bzhin 'bod/ /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad dang / /de bzhin bde legs
rdzogs pa gdon/ /de nas der ni rig sngags ma/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba yi/ /rig sngags bstan pa gang yin pa/ /des ni bdag nyid bsrung
bar bya| |de nas thog mar spyan drang pa/ /ri rab de yi rtse mor ni/ /'dug nas sgra chen 'don par bya/ /chos kyi chu klung spyan drang ba/ /dam pa 'di ni brjod
bar bya| |bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /'dus pa chen po'i mdo dag dang / /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag dang / /rten
cing 'brel par 'byung ba de/ /ma nyams the tshom med pa dang / /'phags pa shA radwa ti'i bu'i/ /seng+ge'i sgra ni dpe med gdon/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi yum/ /rig sngags
rdo rje lcags kyu bzlas/ /de nas kyang ni rtse mo can/ /de nas rdo rje rigs skyes kyi/ /rig sngags dag ni gang 'dod dang / /snying po 'gro lding gtum po dang / /de yi steng dang
'dod pa yi/ /rdo rje ma dang 'og pag can/ /lu gu rgyud dang gtum mo dang / /gser gtum rdo rje thog thog ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur ma/ /rdo rje thub dka' pho nya ma/ /chen
mo bcu dang drug cu bzhi/ /dang po blo gros rdo rje ma/ /gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu ma/ /gsum pa rdo rje nag mo dang / /bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /lnga pa rdo rje rol pa dang /
drug pa yang ni rgod bag can/ /bdun pa rdo rje shugs yin te/ /brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /dgu pa rdo rje dbyug pa ste/ /de ni sna tshogs gzugs zhes grags/ /bcu
pa rdo rje bden pa ste/ /ci dga' bar ni bzlas brjod bya/ /rdo rje dbyug pa blta bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo 'joms byed dang / /bung ba lta ba chu klung dang / /rdo rje ka t+ya na ya dang / /bdug
pas 'jil dang srung ma dang / /yon tan chen mo de la sogs/ /nges pa nyid du bzlas brjod bya/ /des na dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /nges par gnas pas rig sngags
ni| |mchog 'gyur rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /bdug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni brgyad brgyar bzlas/ /des na las su sgrub pa yi/ /rig sngags des ni grub
par 'gyur/ /rig sngags gang la dga' ba des/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yi/ /rig sngags mang po de nyid ni/ /mchog 'dod dngos
grub 'dod pa yis/ /ci nas skyo bar ma 'gyur spyad/ /de nas rdzogs par spyan drangs shing / /gsang sngags rgyas par byas nas ni/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dod pa kun/ /
bzung ba yang ni bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gtso bor 'dzin/ /dad cing mnyam par bzhag pa yi/ /mi ni dam tshig
'dzin du gzhug /des na de la mkhas pa yis/ /bslab gzhi lnga ni sbyin par bya/ /ming 'di zhes ni bya ba bdag /phyin chad nam 'tsho'i bar dag tu/ /srog gcod log par
g.yem pa dang / /rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang / /'bru dang sbyar ba'i chang 'thung ba/ /rtag tu bdag gis spangs zhes smos/ /bslab gzhi mchog dang ldan
pa de| |blo gros rdo rjes bsrung bar bya/ /'bogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ /byin gyis brlab kyi cho ga'ang bya/ /de nas der ni bum pa bdun/ /chu ni rab tu blugs
nas kyang / /blo gros rdo rjes sngags pa des/ /bdud rtsi yis ni brjod pa yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /dril bur bcas pas dran byed brjod/ /lag pa gnyis ka
slar yang sbyar/ /mthe'u chung mthe bong sbrel bya zhing / /bdud rtsi'i chu ni blugs par bya/ /gos gtsang bgos shing rab bsdams pa/ /skra bshig pa la ngu 'bod che/ /mi
bzad rnams ni bsgo bar bya/ /'di ni ngu 'bod chen po ste/ /'khrug cing sdug bsngal chen po'i gnas/ /'di yis khyod ni dam tshig las/ /nyams na myur du gdungs
par 'gyur/ /khyod ni dam tshig shes gyur na/ /rkyen du 'bab par ma lus sbyin/ /des na khyod la mkhas pa 'di/ /'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal byed mi 'gyur/ /dam tshig spangs
pa gang yin dang / /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa/ /de la dam tshig gzhan med pa/ /bstan bcos kyi ni gzhung lugs yin/ /dmyal ba yod pa 'di la ltos/ /nad rnams
thams cad tshogs pa dang / /'byung ba la sogs rnams kyi rgyas/ /khyod ni de nyid ltung bar byed/ /gdon mi za ba'i sdig pa'i las/ /'di la dpyad par bya ba med/ /rtag tu
khyod kyis dam tshig srung / /rtag tu dkyil 'khro mchod pa gyis/ /'on kyang 'byung po sha za sogs/ /sdig byed de dag 'jug mi 'gyur/ /slob dpon la ni gus par bya/ /de ni rdo rje
'dzin nyid yin/ /da ni khyod tshe 'bras bur bcas/ /khyod kyi 'tsho ba 'bras bu yod/ /da ni dam tshig lha rnams dang / /khyod ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal
mtshan 'di/ /ji ltar rtag tu mdzes pa bzhin/ /de ltar khyod ni yon tan gyis/ /dam tshig nges par gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje de blangs la/ /lag pa g.yon pas dril
bu gzung / /lag pa g.yas pas de yi g.yas/ /bzung nas kyang ni spro bar bya/ /'di skad rtag tu grub pa 'di/ /sdug bsngal dag las sgrol ba ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen nyid dang
ni| |lhan cig tu ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas grur ni lugs nas kyang / /khor yug las ni brgal bar bya/ /lag pa btang nas de la ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan
par bya| |'khrul pa med par me tog gis/ /mdun bzhugs bde gshegs man chad dang / /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang mthong ba/ /de dang de la bde bar mchod/ /de nas
thams cad mthong nas kyang / /yon gyi bum par dbul bar bya/ /blo can gyis ni mtshan yang gzung / /dam pa gzhan yang bdag gis bshad/ /rdo rje
stang thabs 'gro ba dang / /gad mo bcas par bsgyur ba dang / /g.yon pas kyang ni gdab par bya/ /seng+ge'i sgra sgrog 'gying ba dang / /mdzub mos hUM yang bsgrags byas
te| |thams cad shin tu byed pa'i mchog /de nas gzhan yang mi shes pas/ /cho ga bzhin du gnod par bya/ /slob dpon gus par legs bya zhing / /dam tshig kyang
ni nges par bstan/ /til zan la sogs mon sran gre'u/ /bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bza'/ /lhag par bla mar gus byas dang / /de la dga' bar byas nas ni/ /
rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rig sngags rnams la sdug par gyur/ /de nas rig sngags tshogs rnams la/ /de yi rig sngags gang 'dod pa/ /de ni bsgrims te bklag
bya zhing / /dngos grub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /de ltar slob dpon rgya chen tshogs rnams dang / /lha dang lha min mchog gzugs du ma yin/ /mthong zhing thos la
'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / /rtag tu legs mchod rjes su bstan pa yin/ /rdo rje'i rigs dpal dang ldan pa las mnyes pa dka' zhing me dang nyi ma las lhag pa
de kho na nyid kyi mi dang dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag ni/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rab tu rtogs pas rtag tu mthong zhing
thos pa'am/ sgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan par byas na dngos grub 'grub pa'am/ phan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje chen po thogs bzhin du rtag tu bdug pa dang / me tog
dang / dri dang / lha bshos rgyas par dbul zhing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de ltar gnas bzhi pa tshul 'jin cing nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di ni/ dpal
skyed cing mchog tu myur ba'i cho ga yin pas na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po nyid yin no/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen
po gnyis kyis dam tshig bshad pa las/ gnas bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs kyi yum/ /sgrub pa yi ni don rnams kun//

sgrub pa byed pa gang yin bshad/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na maste badzra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni badzra ya na maH/ su badzra ya na mo badzra
dU tI ye| na mo badzra shA nI ye/ na mo badzra hr-i da yA ya/ na mo badzraM ku shI ye/ na mo badzra da shu shA ya/ na mo badzra ko ShA ya/ na mo badzra bi dza yA ya/ na mo badzraM ku sha /ko Sha pA
sha bi dza yA ya/ na maHpra brta/ a brta/ badzraM ku shi /mi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ hi ri hi ri/ ki ri ki ri/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ gi ri gi ri/ khi ri khi ri/
b+hi ri b+hi ri/ ki li ki li/ badzra ku lam saM sma ra/ gi ri gi ri/ ti ri ti ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ A na ya me hi rat+na su brta d+ha na d+ha n+ya na/ a ta pa ya ma/ ba ru Na/

ku be ra| in+d+ra mA kaD+D+h+ya/ yan+ta da ma ni/ grih+NAM ku sha na/ ta ta taM/ ki li ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Di/ ki ri Ni brah+ma ba de him+biSh+Nu na ba de hi ma ka lo/ /ku ka kalbi/ ni li bi la ni

li lba ku ma raM ad d+ha ru dri ma de haM tsaN+d+raM ba de hi ma shuk+k+raM ba de hiM/ suR+yaM ba de hiM/ ya maM ba de hiM/ ta ta taM ba de hiM/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bI ri bI ri/ a kram+m+ye/ A na ya a kram+m+ye/ i hi
tu rA hi| tu ru tu ru/ sarba ka lan su/ dri gra bI ra/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ti ri ti ri/ mi li mi li/ tsa ka tsa ka /ki ni ki ni/ bi ri bi ri/ sha tha ku shi sa ha sra/ mi la bi
sha tsaM ku shi badzraM ba he badzraM Ni bri ye/ ma ti ma ti/ ti ri ti ri/ ki ri ki ri/ a kraM mya/ a n+ya kar maM n+ya/ ba ra ka na ma na ya/ ya she ya shi na/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ g+hi ni g+hi

ni| khi ri khi ri/ bi tsa ra bi tsa ra/ ko shaM ko shi ni/ ku be ra ma kra /Sh+Tik+k+raM kad+d+ha/ la la la la/ ha si ni pri ye/ pri yaM ka ri/ tsak+Shur ma ti/ tsak+ShuHpra bi sha /ma na ma ka ri/ sha ya sne

tsaM d+ha ni/ b+hi li b+hi li/ pA sha de brde/ tsak+Shu de/ ha ra ha ra/ ba su ba su/ si mi si mi/ he he hi hi/ ha ha/ ki ki ka la ka la/ pa la pa la/ tsak+ShuHtsak+ShuHta me ka thA ya sarba sar+b+be shaM /ku
ru ku ru/ ba ki me ka ta ya/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pri yam+p+ri ye na/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bi ma ya shaM ya shen/ la b+ha la b+ha/ ki ri ki ri/
mi ti mi ti/ lo ki /ra ma ra ma/ ra ti ka ri b+hi ti ka ri/ ma ma su kha ka ri/ nir b+h+r-i ti ka ra/ king+ka ri king+ka ri/ ka ra ma ri/ bi ti bi ti/ mi ri mi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ bi ri

bi ri| g+hi ri g+hi ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ badzri Ni badzraM ku shi pa ra mAM ku shi ha re badzre k+ShI pa ni ka pa ni ka la shi ba ni/ b+hak+Sha pA Ni/ tsak+Shu rAM ku shi pa ni/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ma pi ri pi ri/

ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ badzre ku shI ye swAhA/ ko shAM ku shi ye swAhA/ ba shAM ku shI ye swAhA/ bi dza yAM ku shi ye swAhA/ ke mAM ku shI ye swAhA/ a dz+nyA yAM ku shI ye

swAhA| sar+b+baM ku sha a kaR+Sha Ni ye swAhA/ de bAM ku shI ye swAhA/ sti pu ru ShAM ku shI ye swAhA/ hr-i da yAM ku shI ye swAhA/ d+harmAM ku shI ye swAhA/ sarba lo ka dza yAM ku shI ye swAhA/ sarba satwa na
mA gaR+Sha Na ba shi ka ra NAM ku shI ye swAhA/ rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid na/ /'di ltar rnam pa gzhan du yang / /rdo rje rigs chen gtso mo ste/ /'bar ba chen mo mchog sbyin mchog/
rigs kyi yum ste rigs kyi mchog /las mchog kun gyi byed pa mo/ /bcings dang grol ba thams cad kyi/ /las kun la ni thub med pa/ /dam
pa ci 'dra de bzhin 'dra/ /bar ma ci 'dra de bzhin 'gyur/ /snying po dang ni ming 'di yang / /gtso bo dang ni mchog tu bshad/ /lag na rdo rje nyid kyang ni/ /skad cig gis
ni 'dis 'gugs na/ /phyi rol rgyal po pho nya sogs/ /tshogs rnams lha ni ci zhig smos/ /lha yi rigs ni mthong ba yi/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de la ni/ /'grub
par mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /gang zhig rab tu bsgrims nas ni/ /yum 'di rtag tu 'chang byed pa/ /de la mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcings pa dang ni
grol ba la/ /rig sngags gsang sngags kun bdag 'gyur/ /nang dang phyi rol bcas pa yi/ /'khor dang ldan par byas na ni/ /gcig pu 'jig rten gsum mchog
dang / /rnam pa gsum du 'gyur bar bshad/ /de dag thams cad khyad par du/ /stobs dang ldan par skye bos brjod/ /mdor na yum 'di thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi
dam par bshad pa yin/ /de dag bsgrubs pa'i dus dang ni/ /tha mal dus su rtag tu yang / /ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ /rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /na maH
tsu ru kuM dang / tsu ru kuM da/ badzra pA Ni na mo b+hud+d+ha s+ya swAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyi phye mas gzhag par bya/ na maHku ru tsu ru badzra pA Ni/
na mo bud+d+ha s+ya swAhA/ 'dis ni/ me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo duM me duM me yuM me du sa duM me/ tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ 'dis bshos dbul lo/ /na mo badzrI badzrI/ badzrI

Ni badzrI Ni/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ e taM sarba big+h+na na pa nI ya kaM /sa ma mA ra ya/ ha na ha na/ ud sA da ya/ nA sha ya/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ sarba duSh+Ta tsit+ta sh+tsa ma ma/ hu
ru hu ru| sid+d+ha sh+tsa N+Da badzra pA Ni/ ra dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ me sbar la sngags 'dis shing 'o ma can gyi yam bsreg shing ngam/ ka ri mA la ka ra'i yam sreg shing dang / ske tshe dang /
lan tshwa ba gsum rnams lhan gcig tu sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na/ bgegs dang log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas de yi sgrub pa ni/ /rig
sngags 'chang ba kun gyis mchod/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni gang gis su/ /stobs chen 'di ni grub pa bshad/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /sangs rgyas
'grub byed mgon po dang / /'jig rten dag na ya mtshan gsang / /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / /rig sngags 'chang dang lto 'phye che/ /
shin tu ya mtshan gsang ba 'di/ /don kun 'grub byed mnyan par gyis/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i rgyal po'i mchog /'di ni so sor 'chang byed pa/ /
de la 'jig rten thams cad na/ /bka' las 'gal bar byed pa med/ /ci ste sgrub pa'i de nyid shes/ /yang na dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du kun byas na/ /
sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'thob/ /lha 'am lha ma yin rnams dang / /gnod sbyin yang na rig sngags 'chang / /gzhan yang gang dag su yang dung / /'gal par byed pa/
gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rig sngags bdag gi bla ma la/ /ci ste mchog tu dang byed na/ /de ni kun las lhag pa dang //
sems can kun gyis mchod pa dang / /rtag tu dngos grub kun byed dang / /gzhan gyi dngos grub 'jigs par nus/ /dus kun tu ni gtsang ba dang / /gsang ba thams
cad 'chad byed la/ /rig sngags 'chang gi go 'phang mchog /shin tu sems par byed pa yi/ /cho gar ldan zhing rgyas par bcas/ /de ni ma lus bshad par bya/ /de
nas lha dang lha ma yin/ /mi dang rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /'byung po'i tshogs dang klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin rnams dang srin por bcas/ /gsang ba'i mchog
ni mnyan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar nas 'khod/ /de nas tshig don rtogs pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la/ /gsal bar bya phyir tshig 'di smras/ /nga ni dkyil
'khor dam pa dang / /bla ma'i rigs ni sngon mthong la/ /rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /rig sngags sgrub pa rtogs byas nas/ /zla ba phyed gsum par du ni/ /zla gcig pas ni bsgrub
par bya| |sangs rgyas gzugs ni rdzogs pa 'am/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten der/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rig sngags rigs kyi tshogs bskor ba/ /cho ga
bzhin du byas nas ni/ /yid dang 'thad pas mchod par bya/ /mtshams gcad pa dang phyogs bcing dang / /chus ni kun nas gcad pa dang / /thams cad du ni srung ba rnams/ /
cho ga bzhin du legs par dgod/ /sna gsum rdo rje bkra shis dang / /lcags kyu kha gdengs yungs kar gyis/ /tshul bzhin dang por mdun dag tu/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i
gzugs su bri/ /kha zas kyang ni dkar gsum gyis/ /cho ga bzhin byas bza' bar bya/ /dus gsum yang na nub bdun du/ /bzlas brjod mchog gi brgyad brgya bya/ /de
nas der ni rdo rje dang / /lcags kyu 'bar ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /der ni gzugs las grub pa po/ /lha yi rig sngags 'chang bzhin 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum yang
snang bar byed/ /sa steng dag kyang 'bar ba dang / /'jig rten gsum yang g.yo bar ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni der mthong 'gyur/ /rig sngags rdo rje
lcags kyu dge /de nas de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri dwags kyis bskor gzhon nu ma'i/ /thad de dga' ba rtsen par 'gyur/ /de nas lha dang 'byung po dag /rgya mtsho
nam mkha' sa gnas pa/ /dang ba med cing ma grub rnams/ /de ltar dga' bar gyur nas ni/ /don rnams kun yang byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni ji ltar yang //
kun tu dngos grub ya mtshan can/ /mkha' la de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de nas ci dga' rgyu ba dang / /de yi dga' mgur de bzhin byed/ /rtse dga' mchog tu shes
par bya| |de ni yun du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de ni dga' bzhin mkha' la 'gro/ /lha yi rig sngags 'chang gis bskor/ /de ni gcig pu ci dga' bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin
pa yin bzhin du/ /lhag par dga' ba'i gnas rnams su/ /rig sngags 'chang bas bskor par 'gyur/ /de ni na da ku ber bzhin/ /dga' bar gang yang rtse bar
'gyur| |dus min na par ni shing rnams dang / /me tog tshal dang 'bras bu'i 'tshal/ /khang bzang mid du 'ong ba rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni sprul par byed/ /'on kyang
'di ni mod tsam ste/ /'dir ni de la bshad mi bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu grub na ni/ /tshig tu brjod pa thams cad grub/ /las kyi dam pa 'di nyid kyis/ /thams cad kyang ni
'grub par bshad/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin mthong nas ni/ /dam tshig dag la mkhas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rig sngags rdo rje 'dzin/ /bla ma tshul bzhin mchod par bya/ /
bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni/ /lha bshos dag kyang tshul bzhin dbul/ /de nas 'dod pa kun sbyin pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rig sngags gdon/ /lha bshos de yi cho ga
dang / /me tog bdug pas mchod byas nas/ /sgrub pa pos ni ci nus kyis/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas kyang / /gdon gyi las
rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /des na gdon ni stong phrag rnams/ /dga' mgur yang ni gzhig par nus/ /yang na g.yul ngor mi bzang 'jig /gdon dag gi ni dkyil
'khor du/ /myur du gdon ni 'bebs pa dang / /de bzhin gzhig dang gsad pa dang / /bcing dang breg dang gzir ba dang / /ku co 'don du 'jug kyang rung / /grong khyer dang ni
gnas rnams dang / /smas pa'i rma ni spo ba dang / /rig sngags dam ba bshad pa 'dis/ /thams cad kyang ni byed par 'gyur/ /babs pa de dag thams cad kyang / /pi wang
dag kyang len du gzhug /de bzhin gar gyi cho ga rnams/ /yid 'ong ya mtshan byed du gzhug /dgug dang rmi lam cho ga dang / /de bzhin lcags
sgrog gzhom pa dang / /rgyal po'i pho brang dag na ni/ /rtsod pa dag las lhag par rgyal/ /gzugs dang stobs chen ldan pa yi/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /
gang gi snying la tshul bzhin rtag /de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med dam/ /klu'am lha yang dga' ba yod/ /der ni kun tu thams cad
la| |don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni blon po dang / /blon po chen po mdun na 'don/ /zhag bdun yang na lnga yi bar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
dbang du 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'chi bar bya 'dod na/ /de yi gzugs de der bris la/ /lag pas mnan la bzlas brjod bya/ /gdon dang klu yi gdon yang rung / /'byung
po 'byung po'i gdon dang ni/ /khar ni rdo rje gzir byas na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /bran mo dang ni mi rnams kyang / /zhag gsum gyis ni brlag par
'gyur| |dbang du bya bar 'dod na ni/ /der yang nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /khyim thab dang ni nor
'jog dang / /khyim dang bzhon pa glang chen rta/ /ma he dang ni grong yang rung / /zhag bdun gyis ni myur bar 'thob/ /gzhan gyis rig sngags rigs kun dang / /gdon
rnams kyang ni brlag par 'gyur/ /khye'u dag dang ni bu mo rnams/ /nad kyis kyang ni ma rungs 'gyur/ /ro bsregs sol ba'i ri mo yis/ /dgra yi gzugs ni der bris
la| |de yi steng du 'dug nas ni/ /gang du gzhom par 'dod pa der/ /gzir bar byas te zhag bdun du/ /bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas na gzir bar
'gyur| |ci ste bu mo thob 'dod na/ /des ni zhag bdun bya bar bstan/ /zhag bdun 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /bu mo'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang ba
bdag nyid kyis/ /khros nas bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /grong khyer dag ni 'bar ba dang / /gser dang de bzhin 'jig pa dang / /gdan dag gis ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /
gang las rgyal 'dod dmag gi nang / /'dug nas kyang ni bzlas brjod bya/ /grong khyer dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /nad kyis grong khyer dkrugs par 'gyur/ /grong gi
dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /grong mi nad kyis dkrugs par 'gyur/ /dgon par 'dug nas bzlas na ni/ /gdug pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /de nas yid ni zhi ba
yis| |zhi ba'i rig sngags brjod par bya/ /zhi phyir rig sngags brjod na ni/ /thams cad du ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /gsad phyir rig sngags bzlas
na ni| |phan tshun du yang gsod par 'gyur/ /'thab tu gzung phyir rig sngags bzlas/ /'thab mo mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing skam phyir ni chu la bzlas/ /zla ba
gcig gis lo ma 'byung / /kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong yang / /zla ba gcig gis bshig par 'gyur/ /ci ste nyi ma rangs par bzlas/ /chu dang zas dang bag tshos
dang | |'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /de ma thag tu sgyur bar byed/ /gzhan gyis bzhon dang de bzhin du/ /shing rta'i bzhon pa 'joms par byed/ /ci ste chu klung
chen po yi/ /'gram du song nas bzlas brjod bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang 'dod dang / /gang dang cho ga ji bzhin gang / /de bzhin cho ga gtor ma dang / /bzlas
brjod sbyin sreg gtsang byas na/ /des na don rnams thams cad kyang / /byed 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /rtag tu bden smra bslab la dga'/ /dngos grub mchog
chen thams cad ldan/ /'byung po sgrub par 'dod na ni/ /zhag gsum smyung byas mar gyi ngo / /bcu bzhi la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /zla ba drug gam zla ba phyed/ /
shing drung yang na dgon par gnas/ /gcig pu srung ba mchog byas la/ /slong mo yi ni zas kyang bza'/ /zla drug yang na zla ba gcig /lha 'am gdon kyang gnas kyang
rung | |zla gcig phyugs kyi lhas su gnas/ /zho dang 'o mar mar yang bza'/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung / /zla gcig sna tshogs zas kyis mchod/ /zla ba
gnyis ni dur khrod du/ /gtor ma bdug pa gtsang sogs mchod/ /thang ngam mchod rten drung du bzlas/ /de nas 'byung po brlag par 'gyur/ /der ni 'byung po dam pa
gang | |yang na thog mar gang 'ongs dang / /gang tshe de la nye bar 'gyur/ /gang na gang zhig sems kyis 'dod/ /de tshe shin tu bsnyen nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rtag tu
bzlas| |de yi ming ni bris nas kyang / /de nyid ming ni gzung bar bya/ /gcig pus dkyil 'khor byas na ni/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs/ /dri la sogs pas
legs mchod nas/ /des ni 'byung po de dag dgug /de yis ming brjod 'byung po rnams/ /dga' nas der ni 'ongs bar 'gyur/ /de nas des ni legs par mchod/ /
gzhan yang 'ongs nas mchod par bya/ /ming ni legs par brjod bya zhing / /skrag byed ming la brten nas ni/ /'byung po sgrub tu grub 'gyur na/ /mi ni 'grub par 'gyur
ba yin| |de nas de la 'byung po rnams/ /kun nas nye bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i zham 'bring mthun byed bzhin/ /las kun yang ni byed
par 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal po'i dmag rnams la/ /rgyal po chen pos byas pa bzhin/ /stobs chen 'byung po'i sde dag la/ /bka' ni kun tu stsol bar byed/ /sa steng
kun tu rtse byed cing / /'byung po'i bdag po kun gyis mchod/ /'byung po dag ni phul ba yis/ /kha zas la sogs thams cad za/ /grong ni gang la rgyal 'dod cing / /
yang na phan par 'dod kyang rung / /bsgrub phyir yang na gzhig pa'i phyir/ /der ni 'byung po rnams kyang gtong / /des ni ming gang ma bkug pa'i/ /'byung po'am 'byung
po'i tshogs kyang rung / /de yi las mchog 'dod na ni/ /de yis ming yang smos par bya/ /ming ni smos pa de yis ni/ /snyems pa med pa'i 'byung po yang / /bkug pa
med par myur du ni/ /bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ba bstan/ /de ni mi yi 'khor dag tu/ /sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur/ /lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu/ /
spyod pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /srog chags mi la sogs rnams kyi/ /srog la dbang bar des 'gyur ro/ /'byor par bya ba'i phyir yang rung / /yang na lus
ni gzhig phyir des/ /ming gis bkug pa'i 'byung po la/ /dga' bzhin bag brkyang smra bar bya/ /ming la sogs pa 'di dag gis/ /sna ni shin tu che ba dang / /shin tu
ring bar byos shig ces/ /bsgo na de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rkang lag bzhin mdog bsgyur/ /ring ba dang ni skam pa dang / /ma rungs par ni byos shig ces/ /
bsgo na de tshe de bzhin byed/ /de bzhin rnam pa mang po dang / /shin tu 'jigs pa sna tshogs rnams/ /de bzhin zhi byed sna tshogs kyis/ /'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur//
mi 'dod na yang mi rnams dang / /'byung po mang pos mthong mi 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang chen bzhin du 'gyur/ /gang zhig rig sngags rtag tu bzlas/ /lha la yang ni
phyag 'tshal zhing / /rtag tu 'byung po rnams la yang / /kha zas ci 'dod sbyin byed por/ /de ni lhag par bde 'gyur zhing / /tshe yang lhag par bskal par thub/ /'byung po
mang po'i rgyal po'i mchog /gtso bor yang ni 'gyur ba dang / /lha yi rgyal po 'dra ba yang / /rkyen du bab par bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sgrub pa rdzogs so// //
rdo rje lcags kyu'i rigs la ni/ /rig sngags don kun grub byed pa/ /lha mo mchog 'gror grags pa 'di/ /sems can rnams kyis bstan par bshad/ /zla ba drug gis
'grub 'gyur te/ /tshig gis don kun byed par bstan/ /rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni/ /srang gcig nges par gzhag par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra
ya s+ya| na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ba ti ba ra ti/ ku sha sam+ba na ma na se/ a ta ra te/ ba te/ ye saM rtse b+hU te/ at+to the/ ru pa ti -i smri ma swAhA/ sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten
drung / /dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya/ /gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa yis/ /lha bshos me tog bdug pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan mo mar me dang / /mchod pa
ci nus ci dga' bya/ /mtshams gcad phyogs bcing srung ba rnams/ /rtag tu rdo rje lcags kyus bya/ /de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la/ /de ni zla ba drug gis 'grub/ /de
nas 'dod chags la sogs dang / /sman chen mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/ /nad dang sman kun ston pa dang / /gtam rgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po
la legs nyes rnams/ /tshig gis ston cing smra bar byed/ /gsang sngags de'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi spyin med pas bcom ldan
'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs bris te/ lha mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te/
zas su 'o ma dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das dang / lag na rdo rje la mchod pa yang rtag tu byas te mjug tu zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas zla ba nya'i nub mo brgyad stong gis bsnun la ci 'byor pas mchod na
'grub par 'gyur te/ don thams cad ston par byed do/ /gzhan yang tshes bcu gnyis nas brtsams te nya'i bar du gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par byas te/ ras la
bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / lha mo dang / sgrub pa po rnams dge bsnyen la 'brir bcug ste sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcom ldan
'das kyi sbyan sngar mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya sngags kyis btab nas phung po lngar bcad de/ de rnams las cha gcig
bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba de dag las kha cig blangs te
ras dkar po'i nang du phur nas sngas su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o/ /'o me dang / phye'i lde gu dang zas dkar po za zhing me tog dkar po dang / dri dkar po phul na/ zla
ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi nyin par yang rung ste/ cho ga de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya bzlas
brjod byas te mchod pa byas la/ lhag ma yang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na/ rmi lam du thams cad ston par byed do/ /cho ga gsum pa ni/ me long la bsgrub par
bya'o| |mchog 'gro ma'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra bra Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ e h+ye hi badzra pA Ni/ i daM
bA ha na| ma nu sma ra shI g+h+raM ma na tsa ba la li ta ga ti/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti badzra pA Ni/ he hi he hi he hi/ hi hi/ he ku ru he ku ru/ ku ku ku ku /ku badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/
bai ri bai ri/ he hi he hi he hi/ ku ku b+ha ku ku b+ha/ badzra pA Ni swAhA/ 'di ni/ snying po spyan drang pa'o/ /de la 'di ni/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po yin no/ /sar+b+ba tra a pa ra dzi taM/ sarba

tra a pra ti ha taM/ sarba tra ar+tha sA d+ha naM/ oM dza te dzo grA ma NAM/ swa rU pa mu pa daR+sha naM/ ki li ki li/ mo ku la shab+dA ru taM badzra t+yu ta ka ra kri t+yu ka ra na ra Na dza naM/ ad b+hA na sid+d+hi

pa ra ma sid+d+hi/ ba tsa laM tsaN+DaM/ pi tra/ pa kaM sa kaM ra ka ra ta ka raM shAM ti ka raM/ puSh+Ti ka raM/ sa bA no pa ra daR+ShaM/ tsa ra daM/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma ar+tha sA d+ha kaM A kaR+Sha NaM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/

bo la lA pa naM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ha sa pa naM/ badzra pa Ni s+ya/ pa ra ma hr-i da ya/ i daM badzra pA Ni s+ya/ badzra pA Ni ra ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti ra dz+nyA pa ya ti badzre Na/ ha na ti/ da ha ti/ pa tsa ti

ts+tshin+da ti/ ts+tshin+da ti/ bi dra ba ya ti/ A lo ka bi lo kaM ka ro ti/ hi li ni/ li mi li/ o u ho u b+ha badzra pA Ni/ hu ru hu ru/ saM baM badzra bAny+dza ye duSh+Tan/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa
pa ce| gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ baM sh+yaM ka ro ha hi la ha lA ya swAhA/ hu lu hu lA ya swAhA/ hi li hi lI ye swAhA/ ka la ka lA ye swAhA/ ku li ku lU ye swAhA/ kI li kI la ye swAhA/ ki li ki lA ya swAhA/

da ya ma na sma ra badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti sa ma ya pra ti gr-ih+Na hu te hu tiM d+hU pa pA sha gan+d+ha ma l+yaM tsa ra swA ma tu twa sa ma yaM bya ta kra ma mAd ma/ sa ma yo bi shud+d+hi/ hi li hi ri na
i laM| ku ru kun+du pra da shak+to smin du ru me ha ra ba rA hi ri li/ ni li badzra pA Ni/ ti li ti li/ ba shi ma nu brta hi ri Ni/ ni ri Ni sa ma yA nu brta hi ri mi ri i bA haM ya ni/ satwaM badzra

pA Ni ma ma hi/ swa ya mu pa tiSh+Tha swAhA/ 'di ni/ de'i bdug pa'i sngags so/ /li hi li hi pi li tu u b+h+yo/ u b+ha/ hu ru hu/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza ba sh+ye me ka ro haM di swAhA/ lag na rdo rje phyag
'tshal bcas/ /rtse mo can zhes bya ba yi/ /snying po 'di ni 'jig rten grags/ /de na 'dod rgur sgrub pa yi/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod cing / /'di yi sgrub pa'i
don shes pa/ /des ni rdo rje sgrub pa'i mchog /ya mtshan 'di ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rim pa ji bzhin du/ /bdag gis legs par bshad par bya//
dam pa'i don gyi rjes mthun pa/ /thub la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ba/ /gser ram ra gan zangs la sogs/ /yang na tsan+dan dmar po las/ /rdo rje rtse mo brgyad pa 'am/ /
yang na rtse mo bzhi par bya/ /sor gsum yang na drug gam brgyad/ /yang na sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /zur brgyad shin tu rdzogs pa 'am/ /yang na zur ni drug tu bya/ /de
nas dgon pa'am rang gi khyim/ /gtsang zhing mnyam pa'i sa phyogs su/ /ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor byug /sku gdung mchog dga' gtsang ma yis/ /de yi steng
du dri zhim pa'i/ /spos kyi dkyil 'khor byug par bya/ /yungs kar phul thag bzhi rnams kyang / /dbus dag tu ni gzhag par bya/ /de yi steng du rdo rje de/ /dri dang me
tog phreng bas brgyan/ /rtag tu yang ni dus gsum du/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /tsam pa ka dang tsam pa ka'i/ /me tog sna ma'i me tog rnams/ /yid du
'ong bas sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa nges par mchod/ /du ru ska dang a ga ru/ /bdug pa'i mchog ni rtag tu bsreg /sku gzugs cho ga bzhin bris
la| |cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /sangs rgyas thad na gnas pa yi/ /lag na rdo rje g.yon phyogs bri/ /rgyal po bzhin du brgyan bya zhing / /ha
cang dmar bar mi bya ste/ /sku gzugs nub phyogs logs su bstan/ /shes rab can gyis cho ga 'di/ /bya ste de ni rim bzhin bshad/ /dang po yang ni tshes gcig
brtsams/ /nges par gnas shing gtsang ba yis/ /khrus ni ba lang lci ba dang / /ba gcin btsags pas dus gsum bya/ /mdun du rtag tu gos phrugs ni/ /bdug
pas rab tu bdugs pa bgo /tsam pa ka dang tsam ka yi/ /me tog rnams kyis rtag tu mchod/ /sna tshogs dri dang me tog phreng / /mdzes shing yid du 'ong bas mchod/ /
lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya/ /du ru ska dang a ga ru/ /bsreg cing mar me gnyis kyang dbul/ /rtag tu 'chi bar mi bya ste/ /de bzhin mar gyi mar me
gzhan| |nyin gcig bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /de tshe 'o ma'i lde gu rnams/ /za zhing mnyam par bzhag pa dang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad ldan pas/ /tshes ni bcu
gnyis par du yang / /rtag tu ku sha'i mal stan 'dug /de nas zhag gsum smyung byas nas/ /zla ba nya la cho ga bzhin/ /dpe med pa yi mchod pa bya/ /der ni tshon
rtsi sna gsum gyis/ /grong khyer dag kyang bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi lham pa sgo bzhir ldan/ /phyogs cha legs par gcad bya zhing / /mnyam byas de
yi nang dag tu/ /lha bshos dkar po dpe med dbul/ /phyi ril du yang sna tshogs pa/ /ci 'dod thams cad gzhag par bya/ /de nas ku sha'i stan 'dug cing / /srung
byas cho ga shes pa des/ /rdo rje 'bar bar gyur gyi bar/ /a ga ru dang du ru ka /bsreg cing dga' bzhin bzlas brjod bya/ /nyi ma las lhag de yi gzi/ /rdo rje de ni
legs par blang / /cis kyang mi 'jigs mkha' la 'gro /rig sngags grub pa'i stobs dang ldan/ /rig sngags bdag po thams cad dang / /lag na rdo rje rigs
skyes pa'i/ /rig sngags tshogs ni kun gyis mchod/ /don mang dag la brten bya zhing / /rnam pa mang du ci zhig smos/ /lag na rdo rje mnyam 'gyur te/ /'di la the
tshom ci yang med/ /de nas dga' ba ma yin pa'i/ /las de dag kyang 'dir bya ste/ /de dag gi ni mdor bstan pa/ /snying po bsdus pa bshad par bya/ /gang zhig mi
yi gtso bo 'am/ /blon po dbang du bya 'dod des/ /de yi sgrub pa gang yin pa/ /'di yang rab tu bshad par bya/ /zhag bdun gtsang mar byas nas ni/ /nas kyi zas
ni dus su bza'/ /de nas seng ldeng me bsangs la/ /yam bsreg shing dang sbrang rtsi zho/ /mar blangs brgyad brgya tshang bar ni/ /dus gsum du yang sbyin sreg bya/ /dus kyi lhag ma rtag tu
bzlas/ /lan gsum khrus byas nges par gnas/ /dbang du bya 'dod gang yin pa/ /de dang yang ni phrad par bya/ /de yi ming ni smos pas kyang / /de ni bran bzhin dbang du
'gyur/ /mi ni gang zhig bran mor 'dod/ /des ni nor gyi tshad bsam la/ /de yi sgrub mchog 'di bya zhing / /lan gsum khrus bya bil ba yi/ /bdug pa mar dang ldan pa
bsreg /de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun/ /der ni ba lang lci ba'i mer/ /sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /sbyin sreg mnyam par bzhag pas bya/ /yang na bil ba'i sbyin sreg
ni| |mar dang yungs kar ldan pa 'am/ /yungs kar mar dang ldan pa'ang rung / /yang na mar ldan pil ba 'am/ /mar dang yungs kar ldan pa yi/ /sbrang rtsi bzang po bil bar
ldan| |yang na re re sbyin sreg mchog /brgya rtsa brgyad du bya ba ste/ /seng ldeng yam bsreg shing bzang gis/ /dus gsum du ni rnam gsum byas/ /phye dang ba gcin lde gu dang / /
phye dang 'o ma'i lde gu'ang rung / /dus gsum bza' zhing yang na ni/ /mi smra mi bza' rig sngags bzlas/ /yang na sbyin sreg yid kyis bya/ /gtsang zhing brtson par
gnas pa des/ /nor ni yid la gang 'dod pa/ /zhag bdun gyis ni thob par 'gyur/ /zla phyed yang na zla ba gcig /yang na zla ba phyed gsum
gyis| |rnam pa kun gyi thabs rnams kyi/ /'dod pa thams cad ma lus sbyin/ /yang na gdon gyi las rnams 'dir/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod brtson pa dang / /gtsang
zhing dam tshig mkhas pa yis/ /thams cad rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtsed mo can gyi snying po rdzogs so// //de nas gtum po'i snying po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par
bya'o| |na maHtsi li tsi ri Ni/ i li ku ru had ti pra sid+d+ha b+ha ga to smi ku ru me ha ba raM ki li bi li/ hi ri Ni su ru ku ru/ sa ma ya ma nu brta hr-i da ye swAhA/ snying po dran par
byed pa'i tshig 'di dag gang du brjod pa der dga' bar gyur nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /na maHkI li kI lA ya swAhA/ ma hA kI li kI la ya swAhA/ kro d+ha kI
li kI la ya swAhA/ tsaN+Da kI li kI la ya swAhA/ de ba ti kI li kI la ya swAhA/ badzra kI li kI la ya swAhA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swAhA/ badzra mo ta nA ya swAhA/ badzra staM b+ha ya swAhA/ badzra
pra baM d+ha nA ya swAhA/ i hi sti badzra/ e hi su sti badzra/ e hi pra ti ra badzra/ e hi a pra ti ta ha badzra/ e hi a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi shi g+h+raM ni la be ga badzra/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA
pa ti| badzra pA Ni/ mu ne mu ne mu ne/ re ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ su ma ti/ e hi pa ni ti li/ sau haM di li pir twa ma ti to ni ra ti ti/ ku la ti li/ shi li/ tsa ra di mo ha te ku cing tha
marte| su bu ru bu ru/ khu khu ti/ khu da li ti li ti ri/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ i daM gan+d+ha ma le/ a nu le pa na maHpra ti ts+tsha ku ti ku ti ku ti swAhA/ ku
di bi ri bi ri ti swAhA/ bi ti maM ku ti la swAhA/ a ra li sa ra sha li/ tsi ri li sa ra li gi ri ni/ barma li ni si li ti/ pur+Na kur+Na/ sarba durba tu kut+ta/ mut+ta/ narba barba balba
ram+ba ha hwa/ e hi e hi/ shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ he he hai hai he/ tu ru tu ru/ la hUM la hUM swAhA/ sma ra ha na mi ti ri ti/ di ri ri ti li pu swAhA/ ku khu lu tu ku ka ti lu ti li ri
swAhA| e hi tri ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti hi ri/ ti li bi ti/ ri li gi ni/ ni ra dzan+tu bi ri dza yan+tu ri kin+ta rang+ga tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri ti ri swAhA/ narba sharba ba ba ku ku lu/ khu khu
lu| khu khu ti ni/ ru ru ta ru/ sma ra taM/ pra ti dzA ya swAhA/ lag na rdo rje gtum rab gtum/ /nga yi snying po gnyis pa ni/ /gtum zhing rab gtum las yin te/ /ming
yang gtum po zhes par grags/ /gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /snying po gtum po 'di dag ni/ /nyes pa zhes ni bya ba bstan/ /las rnams la ni zla phyed de/ /dam pa
rnams kyi las kun mchog /gdon la sogs pa'i sems can dang / /'gugs pa'i mchog la sogs pa dang / /srung ba la sogs dpe med pa/ /
'di yi las ni stong rnams dang / /cho ga chen po brgyad rnams kyang / /lha gnas mthong bar nges par ni/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnams kyis bya/ /la la gang zhig rdo rje
'dzin| |mngon sum mthong bar 'dod na ni/ /nga yi sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag /spyan 'dren mchog 'di de yis bya/ /dus gsum ba lang lci bas bskus/ /las kyang
dag cing sems dag dang / /rdo rje 'dzin la gus pa dang / /rkang lag la sogs bkrus nas kyang / /dgon pa'am rang gi khyim yang rung / /gtsang ma'i phyogs su
mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs yang na sku gdung gi /mdun du rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /mi ni gtsang sbrar spyod pa yis/ /bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/ /mchog
dang khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /dus gsum rtag tu mchod par bya/ /de la rab spro de la gus/ /srog kyang de la bstan byas nas/ /lag na rdo rje gzugs kyang rung / /
ji skad bstan bzhin ri mor bri/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /rtag tu de la mchod par bya/ /mar dang ldan pas dus su bza'/ /sbrang rtsi 'o thug bza' bar bya/ /
ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan/ /rtag tu shar phyogs kha blta 'dug /mar gyi mar me mi 'chi bas/ /nyin par mchod pa legs par bya/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla
phyed dam/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad la/ /brtsams te brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ /yang na nyin re dus gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya/ /thang
chu yang ni bsreg par bya/ /dang zhing rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /srung ba'i mchog byas bzlas brjod bya/ /zla ba phyed ni lon nas kyang / /des ni zhag gsum smyung ba byas/ /
mchod pa la sogs kun rgyas shing / /shin tu mang por byas nas kyang / /'dod pa yis la gzhag bya zhing / /de nas gus pa mchog gis su/ /oM ni tshig stong bzlas brjod
bya| |de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de la mchod sbyin gtso bo de/ /dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byed/ /sgrub pa'i cho gas spyan drangs nas/ /mchod sbyin mchog la ci 'dod
smos| |tshig gis gang dang gang brjod pa'i/ /sgrub pa'i dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /de yi slar gtang cho ga de/ /rnam ba thams cad bshad par bya/ /des ni phyag dang
mchod pa dang / /mchod yon me tog la sogs dbul/ /'dod pa'i rig sngags lan gcig brjod/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro /na maHhi li hu la/ ni li hu la/
a ha ha ha ha ha/ sa pra ti gats+tsha tu b+ha ga bAM badzra pA Ni re tha su khaM tsu lu tsu lu swAhA/ 'di ni gcig gam gsum du brjod/ /lnga 'am bdun nam nyi shu
gcig |brgya 'am yang na brgyad brgya 'am/ /lan stong cho ga bzhin du brjod/ /'byung po'i gnas sam gzhan dag tu/ /rdo rje dang ni lha yi mdun/ /dri kun gyi ni sbyor
ba dang | |bcing dang grol la bzlas brjod bya/ /dgug dang slar gtang thams cad dang / /bcing dang grol ba thams cad la/ /der ni lan gcig brjod par bya/ /des
na rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro/ /'di ni rtsed mo ldan pa yin/ /sgrub dang slar gtang ba yang yin/ /'di gnyis la ni khyad par du/ /dbye bar bya ba mang po yod/ /gang gis rtag
tu gtsal byas la/ /lo gcig par du dus gsum du/ /bzlas brjod rnam pa gsum byas na/ /de yis bde bar 'dod pa 'thob/ /gang zhig zla drug sgrub byed cing / /
bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byed/ /legs byas de ni mkha' la rgyu/ /'bring dang lhag ma nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig zla gsum bzlas brjod byed/ /yang na yid kyis
sbyin sreg las/ /byas na cho ga 'di dag gis/ /de ltar de yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed gsum za gcig zos/ /des ni dngos grub tha ma 'am/ /'bring dang khyad
par 'phags pa thob/ /khyim gyi don rnams grub byed cing / /nad rnams kyang ni sel bar byed/ /don rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /de dag thams cad rab tu
'grub| |zla ba gcig tu bzlas brjod byed/ /'o thug sbrang rtsi mar bcas bza'/ /dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas pas ni/ /gsum brjod mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur//
legs par ma byas don la sogs/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcing dang dgrol ba thams cad dam/ /sgrub pa'am gzhig pa bcad par byed/ /zla phyed
nas kyi kha zas zos/ /gdon gyi las rnams byed par nus/ /ba gcin nas kyi kha zas zos/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par nus/ /zhag bdun du ni dus gsum
du| |de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas/ /dbang du bya dang bcings la sogs/ /gsad par yang ni nus par 'gyur/ /gang zhig zhag lngar zas mi za/ /nyin gcig
bzhin du bzlas brjod byed/ /des na mo rnams gzhig pa 'am/ /dgrol dang dbang du bya bar nus/ /zhag gsum bar du dus gsum du/ /gang zhig sbyin sreg rnam gsum
byed| |lhag ma'i dus su khros nas bzlas/ /des ni gzhan yang gzhig par nus/ /drag po yi ni las byed na/ /zhag gcig smyung byas dur khrod du/ /khrag gi sbyin sreg
byas na ni/ /des ni gdon dang mi rnams gzhig /de dag bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ /dang por zhag gsum smyung byas nas/ /mar gyi ngo ni bcu
bzhi la| |sum brgya lnga bcu gtsang mas bzlas/ /sngar bstan 'di dag byas na ni/ /de nas nges par gnyis kas kyang / /tshig gis gang dang gang smras pa/ /bsam
pa'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de ltar rtsed mo ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po mchog kyang bshad/ /'gro lding snying po gsum pa yang / /cho ga dag dang bcas par
ni| |las kyi dam pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin 'bring dang tham la/ /rdo rje rdzogs par khru gang srid/ /rtse gsum yongs su dag pa'i mchog /yang na rtse drug dam
pa ni| |de kun gyis ni bri bar bya/ /sus mchod rdo rje rig sngags kyis/ /rdo rje de ni spyan yang drang / /me tog dam pa ma nyams pa/ /lag pa g.yon thogs legs
par mchod/ /lag na bdug thogs pus mo btsugs/ /des ni rig sngags 'di yang bzlas/ /na mo reM reM grAM grAM /tsi ri Ni bi naM/ tra pa ru Ni/ badzrA sa ma ya/ tu bi ta ye
badzra pa ni ma hA bA hA yA swAhA/ bris pa de ni lag g.yon thogs/ /mchod gnas kyang ni mchod par bya/ /bya ba zin nas slar gtang phyir/ /mchod gnas slar ni
gtang bar bya/ /gtum po dang / rtse mo can gyi sgrub pa rdzogs so// //'gro lding gi snying po bshad par bya ste/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa'o/ /de nas
gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dul ba mchog gis gnas shing bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mgo bo btud cing thal mo rab tu sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags so/ /bdag gi
snying po ni/ 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug na de'i thad du bdag myur du 'chi bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das| ci ste bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug pa las ma mchis na/ 'jig rten pa la dgra bcom pa gsod pa'am/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang
lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na/ zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na de las bcom ldan
'das kyis slar gtang bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das yid tsam 'dzum pa mdzad de lag na rdo rje la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas/ khyod la nga mnyes kyi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po
lag na rdo rje khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad par ma byed cig /de lta mod kyi/ nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan par ni/ 'dod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas
gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong cung zad tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
bdag la gsan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ e hi sti ra badzra/ e hi su sti ra badzra/ e hi ma tu badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ e hi e ma ka badzra/ e hi shI gaM ni la be ga badzra/
be ga badzra/ ma hA badzra/ badzrA pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ti mu ne mu ne/ a nai ri ma ti/ a nai ri ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ su ma ti/ a rin+ti li/ d+hu ri ti me de pu li ri ti/ dzi ri ti ku

la ti shi li shi pa li ti ma ti pu tshod ta ma rte tsit+ta tsit+ta marta/ du ru du ru/ khu khu ti khu khu ti ha la ti la ti ri e hi shI g+haM badzra pA Ni i daM gaM d+ha mA le nu le pa na de/ pra tits+tsha/
ut+ta li| ud+tha ud+tha li swAhA/ ku ti bi ri ti swAhA/ tsi ti bi ti ha ti swAhA/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ a la li ma la ri ri bi li ni/ par ma yi ni shi li/ li bi ba li/ lo ti pu rna garba

sharba narba/ tu rba ut+ta/ put+na narba tsarba sharba mam+b+ha dzam+b+ha bam+b+ha swAhA/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni he hi he hi/ tu ri tu ri la hUM la hUM swAhA/ /sma ra tan+ta ka ra n+ta/ ti dz+nyA taM mi ti ri ti mi ti ri ti/

mi di ti ti li/ ri ri ri/ khu yu lu khu khu yi la hu na ri ti a hrI twaM/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pA ti li ri li ri li ri/ ba si ri ri ki ri ti smra ri ma hA smra ri u dzu ri ge tsu ru tsu ru ti swAhA/ tar+b+ha
b+harba mar+b+ha khu khu la khu ti li/ tu ru tu ru/ smra ra taM pra ti dz+ho swAhA/ 'gro lding zhes bya'i snying po 'di/ /'jig rten gsum grags 'jig rten gyi/ /rab kyi mchog gi gtso bo ste/ /
lag na rdo rje gsum pa yin/ /'di ga rten gsum mchog gtso bos kyang / /'di las 'gal bar byed mi nus/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'jig rten dbang / /tshangs pa
la sogs snying po'i bar/ /de yi sgrub pa de nyid de/ /de yi las rnams rgyas pa yang / /rtsed mo can dang gtum po bzhin/ /'di yang de ltar bya ba ste/ /sgrub pa'i mdo tsam
bshad bya na/ /gtsang ma'i mis ni gtsang ma'i phyogs/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa rnams/ /mchod dang khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /mchod rten yang na sku gzugs
rnams| |sku gdung ldan pa mchod par bya/ /rdo rje bris pa legs mchod nas/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan/ /yar gyi chos brgyad
brtsams byas la/ /sbrang rtsi 'o thug mar dang bcas/ /dus gsum za zhing rig sngags bzlas/ /thang chu bzang po bsreg par bya/ /lci ba sogs pa legs par
bkru| |dag pas shar phyogs bltas te 'dug/ shin tu mnyam bzhag dus gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas yid du 'ong ba yi/ /
mchod pa las bzhin mjug tu bya/ /zla ba phyed ni 'das nas kyang / /nya yi nub mo spyan yang drang / /lha yi gnas ni mthong ba des/ /cho ga mchog gis bsrung bar
bya| |brgya rtsa brgyad ni brjod byas na/ /de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de nas gzhan yang stong gi phyed/ /ci ste gus pas 'dun pas mchod/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen mngon
sum du| |mthong 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /mchod sbyin mchog gi gtso bo des/ /de la dam pa sbyin par 'gyur/ /yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid/ /'dod pa
gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i slar gtang dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i las rnams kyang / /mjug tu legs par
bya ba yin/ /'gro lding gi cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes
bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te dul ba mchog gis gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis skye bo mang po sman pa'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags te/ bdag gi snying po ni/ 'di
lags so/ /gang gis snying po 'dis bdag bkug na/ de'i thad du bdag myur du 'chi bar 'tshal lo/ /ci ste bdag snying po 'dis bkug pa las ma mchis na/ 'jig rten la
la mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na/ zhag gcig
smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na/ de las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gtang du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yid tsam
'dzum pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes
kyi| gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po/ khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad pa ma byed cig /de lta mod kyi/ nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan bar ni/ 'dod do/ /de skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong yid tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag
gi snying po cho ga dang bcas pa gsan du gsol/ 'di sgrub par 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod par dga' bas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zas
su 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu 'tshal te dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug pa sreg cing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i
mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par bgyis la snying po brjod par bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi thog mar bdag nyid srung bar
bgyi'o| |na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ shrI mu ata trai b+ha/ badzra pA Ni ma ti shi ba mA nA ya/ a n+yo n+ya badzra a sha nir na ma/ sarba gra hA
