phyag rgyas bya'o/ /rmi lam du ston du gzhug pa la ni/ gtsug phud dang / ras kyi tshar tshar ram/ chos gos kyi gra la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bya'o/ /
gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //rig sngags thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sa gzhi mdog sdug cing gseg ma dang / rus
pa dang / srog chags kyi gnas med par bkra shis pa'i phyogs su mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad las yongs su sbyang ba brtsams nas dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug gra bzhi
pa byas nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la tshon rtsi sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ /sgo bzhi gdod par bya'o/ /tshon rtsi 'byung khungs nas byung ba'i tshon gyis bri bar bya ste/
dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lag na rdo rje gnas pa'i stegs bu byas la/ de'i phyogs gcig tu gur gum gyis rdo rje sor brgyad tsam bri'o/ /de'i steng du yungs kar
gyis rdo rje bya'o/ /de'i steng du tsan+dan dmar po las rdo rje sor brgyad pa byas la gzhag go/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar phyogs kyi sgor ni/ rdo rje dang / 'khor
lo gzhag go /lho phyogs su ni/ rdo rje dang / dbyug pa gzhag go /nub phyogs su ni/ rdo rje dang / zhags pa gzhag go /byang phyogs su ni/ rdo rje dang / be con gzhag go /dkyil
'khor zlum po'i nang du phyogs bzhi nas rdo rje thams cad gzhag go /de dag gi phyi rol du khru gang tsam gyis dpag ste dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams kyis bskor nas tshes
gcig la brtsams te bsgrub par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir ni/ bum pa mi nag cing rtsa ba med pa bzhi 'o mas bkang ste gzhag go /nyin gcig bzhin du mtshan mo mar gyi mar me
yang dbul lo/ /lnga pa de lag na rdo rje dang / bcom ldan 'das la yang dbul lo/ /stegs bu der sku gdung dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs bzhag la de'i mdun du lha dang rdo
rje dri thams cad kyis legs par bri bar bya ste/ khru gang tsam du bya'o/ /de'i phyogs gcig tu thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar byas la der shing 'o ma can gyi yam sreg
shing gis me spar te dgang blugs phul nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas la/ de nas bzlas brjod lan brgyad stong bya'o/ /zas
su 'o ma dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du bdug pa dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas mchod de dus gsum du gos brje ba dang / mi smra bas bsgrub par bya'o//
de'i mjug tu zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ zla ba nya la mchod pa rgyas par byas nas sgrub cing lag pas rdo rje mnan te nam dro bar gyur ba dang / dud pa
'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa dang / nam mkha' la 'phags par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas blangs na/ lag na rdo rje dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur
te tshe bskal par thub cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan la/ dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus par 'gyur ro/ /smyung bar 'dug pa'i nyin mo ni/ rtag tu mnan te
bzlas brjod bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la yang phyogs thams cad kyang lha bshos rgyas pa dbul lo/ /sgo re rer yang mar gyi mar me gnyis dbul
lo| |nang du mar gyi mar me bzhi dbul lo/ /thog mar ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas ba lang gi lci bas skyang nul byugs la dri byugs nas gdod bri bar bya'o/ /'di ni/
pho nya ma thams cad kyi rdo rje sgrub pa spyi'i cho ga yin te/ las thams cad kyang las kyi rdo rje lag na thogs par bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi chun po 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ /
de ltar grub nas phyi de nyin par mchod pa shin tu rgyas par bya'o/ /blo gros rdo rje ma sgrub pa'i cho ga gsum pa ni/ ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi spyin med pas blo gros
rdo rje ma pad+ma'i mdog can lag na pad+ma thogs shing pad+ma la 'dug pa bri'o/ /de nas zhag lnga'i bar du ba gcin dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du khrus bya zhing dus gsum
du gos brje ba dang / rtswa dur ba'i stan la nyal bas dus gsum du pad+ma brgyad brgya la lan re bzlas brjod byas te dbul lo/ /zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar byas te
mchod pa rgyas par byas nas lha bshos kyang phul la nub gsum pad+ma brgyad stong phul na/ 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rdo rje
ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ ni ri ni ri/ pa sh+ye pa sh+ye ne swAhA/ 'di ni/ pho nya ma lta ba ma zhes bya
ste| 'di ni/ las thams cad rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /gsal snang gi cho ga bya bar 'dod na ni/ ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs
te bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri phul nas bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud pa phra mo nyis bltab tu byas pa sor bzhi pa gnyis byas la/ de nas lan bdun bzlas brjod
byas te dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bzhag la de nas rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ 'di skad du ci ste don 'di 'grub pa lta na/ gcig la gcig 'khri bar gyur cig /
mi 'grub pa lta na/ so sor gyes par gyur cig ces bya'o/ /de nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ltas ston par 'gyur te/ gtsang zhing tshangs
par spyod pa dang / smyung bar byas pas bya'o/ /skyes pa dang / bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ de'i ming dang ldan par rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ ma da na'i shing
las gzugs byas nas tsha ba gsum gyis bkang la tshigs bdun du ma da na'i tsher ma bdun gyis btab nas zangs kyi thur ma rkub tu btsugs te spyi bor phyung la seng
ldeng gi 'dab ma'i dugs kyis bdug cing / zhag bdun gyi bar du kha shar phyogs su bstan te dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas mjug tu lan
stong byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhig par 'dod na yungs nag gi 'bru las gzugs byas la rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te seng ldeng gi me'i nang du
dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la gso sbyong dang ldan pas ro bsregs pa'i sol ba
blangs te lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas dgra'i gzugs bris la rtag tu mgo bo dang / snying ga dang / lag pa gnyis dang / rkang pa gnyis su lcags kyi phur
bu re btab na lce 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /de ming nas smos shing de'i rkang pa'i drung du ni ma pa'i bud shing khrag gi nang du smyugs pas me bus pa yungs nag dang / lan tshwa dang / til
nag po bsregs te khrag dang sbyar bas dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyi mthu bskyed
par 'dod na/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri phul la bum pa gsar ba chus bkang ste sman thams cad dang / sa bon thams cad
dang / dbyig rnams blugs la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas ras ma nyams pas smad g.yogs byas te khrus byas na/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu bcom par 'gyur
ro| /de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na/ ut+pa la dmar po dang / pad+ma skyon med pa dang / pad+mot+ta ra dang / sa ha tsa ra dang / gi'u wang dang / rdo pha bang long bu dang / mig
sman gyi gtso bo 'di dag glang po'i rdul dang sbyar nas rgyun ma chad par lan stong sbyin sreg bya ste/ skar ma rgyal la mig bskus na/ de ma thag tu 'jig rten thams cad
la dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lus mi snang bar 'dod na/ mig sman gong ma de nyid lcags las mi'i gzugs byas pa'i spyi bo phug la de'i lto ba mig sman gyis
bkang ste lcags kyi phur bus btab nas zhag gsum smyung bar byas la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi'i nub mo bzlas brjod byas te ro bsregs pa'i me 'bar
ba'i nang du bor nas 'byung po'i gtor ma thams cad phul la grangs nges pa med par bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rmi lam du mi nag po mthong bar 'gyur te/ grub zin
no zhes zer ba dang / nang par langs te nges mig bskus na/ lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rdul la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te gdong bskus na/ rgyab po'i pho
brang dang / rtsod pa'i nang du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ don yang grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsal snang bya bar 'dod na/ smyung ba byas la bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / lha
bshos phul te mthe bong rgya skyegs kyi khu bas mdog bsgyur nas dri zhim pos bgos pa'i til mar gyis bskus te byis pa byad bzang la mdog nag pa byed du bcug
nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na me long la yang bya ste/ mig la sngags kyis gdab bo/ /gos dang rgyan thams cad
la yang sngags kyis gdab bo/ /lta ba ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas lha kun lu gu rgyud/ /lag na rdo rje'i g.yung drung las/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud grags
pa| |bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni/
thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub cing don thams cad la 'grub pa lags kyi/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba stsal ba dang / dge slong dang / dge
slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la sman pa gang lags pa bdag gi 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ sa'i steng gang na bdud sdig can gyi dbang du gyur
pa| dad pa ma mchis pa/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la bgegs bgyid pa de dag gzhom pa'i slad du rig sngags rdo rje lu gu
rgyud ces bgyi ba 'di bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ las thams cad bgyid pa/ thams cad gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
bgyid pa 'di'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas lag na rdo rjes rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams la bltas so/ /de nas
rig sngags kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de'i tshe ched
du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /nad med pa ni rnyed pa'i mchog /chog shes pa ni nor gyi mchog /yid brtan pa ni gnyen gyi mchog/ mya ngan 'das
pa bde ba'i mchog /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po 'khor dang bcas
pa| g.yog dang bcas pa/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen
mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mdzes pa lag na 'khor lo
dang rdo rje thogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags rdo rje'i rigs su gtogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dga' bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu rdo rje 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
byi ru dang / rdo rje mdzes pa sna tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri za thams cad kyis mchod
pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis brjod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin thams cad kyis phyag byas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung pos
brjod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten skyong gis brjod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags thams cad kyis phyag byas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po
dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / phur bu dang / drang srong bdun gyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar mos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri len
gyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag mos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma tang+gis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |dbang pos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nus phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma dang zla bas
phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram zes phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon gyi drang srong gis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rlung lhas phyag byas pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje pho nya ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas par mi snang bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / phur bu gsum pa la
sogs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do// //'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o//
'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol ta/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas pa/ gsang chen
dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad
ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga
rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni/ khyod gtum pa yin/ bsten par dka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/ lag na rdo rje/
khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ gsang ba med par las mi byed do/ /lag na rdo rje/ de bas na/ rdo rje'i rigs
'di dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad pa/ gsang ba/ gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos
na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer
bar 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad
ba yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang / smyung bar ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge
sbyong ma yin pa yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad
pa dang las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi ming brgyad pa/ gsang ba/ gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ ngas bshad kyi/ nyon cig /'di lta ste/ khyod ni/ glang po che'i rna ba can yin/ khyod ni/ rgyan bzang po dang ldan pa
yin| khyod ni/ rnam par gnon pa yin/ khyod ni/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin/ khyod ni/ bden pa nyid yin/ khyod ni/ gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ /
khyod ni| 'bar ba'i me lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni/ gzugs mdzes pa yin no/ /khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa dag gis thos na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshem du/
na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa des na de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /na mo d+ha rma s+ya/ na mo d+ha rma s+ya/ na maHsaM g+ha s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ aT+Te/ maT+Te/ kha raT+Te/ so me so me su khi/ hi ri hi ri/
mi ri ki ri/ b+hi ri bi sa ni sin+d+ya n+tu/ sarba kAR+ya Ni sA d+ha ya man+ta pA daHswAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so legs so/ /'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de ni/ legs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lags
so| |de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rig pa mchog sgrub pa na bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad pa bklag par bgyi'o/ /bklags
na bdag bstod par 'gyur te/ dga' na dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal lo/ /bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol
bar bgyid do/ /nyal ba'i tshe bklags na/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na/
sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa yang bskal pa bzang por byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes bdag
mchi'o| |lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi d+hA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams
cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te/ mi thub pa/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bden pa/ sra ba/
brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa /sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa/ rig
sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa/
gdon thams cad brlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad tshar gcod pa/ rig
sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ sems
can thams cad srung ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad rangs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag

na rdo rjes rab tu smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM tra Ta tra Ta/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta

ya| g+hUr+NA g+hUr+NA/ g+hUR+NA pa ya g+hUR+NA pa ya/ sarba satwa na/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ saM b+h+ra ma ya saM b+h+ra ma ya/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ saM kuT+Ta ya saM kuT+Ta

ya| sarba sha trU/ g+haT+Ta g+haT+Ta/ saM g+haT+Ta ya/ saM g+haT+Ta ya/ sarba bid+yA badzra badzra/ s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/ ka Ta ya badzra badzra/ ma Ta ya badzra badzra/ ma Ta ya badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ aT+Ta ha
sa nI la badzra/ su badzra ya swAhA/ he phu l+lu/ ni ru phu l+lu/ gr-ih+Na kul+lu mi li tsul+lu/ ku ru kul+lu/ badzra be dza yA ya swAhA/ kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta

ma Ta| ra Ta ra Ta/ mo Ta na/ pra mo Ta nA ya swAhA/ tsa ra ni tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ badzra bi dA rA ya swAhA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA kI li kI la ya

swAhA| ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha badzra kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ tsu ru tsu ru tsan+da kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ ha ra ha ra/ badzra dA rA ya swAhA/ pra ha

ra pra ha ra/ badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swAhA/ ma ti s+thi ra badzra su ti s+thi ra badzra/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra/ ma hA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi badzra/ shI g+h+raM badzra ya swAhA/
d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badzra ku laM A ba rta ya swAhA/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ sarba ba laM A brta ye ma hA ba le ka Ta be ta Ta le/
a tsa le| maN+Da la mA ye/ a ti badzra/ ma hA ba le be ga ra Na/ a dzi te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ piM ga le da ha da ha/ he dzo ba ti/ ti li ti li/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ma hA pa le/

badzrAM ku sha dz+wA lA ya swAhA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Sh+tsaN+Da badzra pa Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/

da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badzra/ b+hin+da b+hin+da badzra hUM phaT/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/
tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed/ /rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun
gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs
pa dang / /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal dang
gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang / /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya nga ngal las byung ba yi/ /rmi lam
sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ /
zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mi zad pa yi nad rnams kyang //
de dag thams cad zhi bar lta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /nor bu yungs kar dur ba dang / /
rin chen rma med tsan+dan bcas/ /shel dang rdo rje me tog dang / /chu yis gser ram yang na ni/ /dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing
dgang / /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni/ /rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig /rdo rje rnam
par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA la shI la dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur
cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya ma hA badzra me ru shi kha ra kU Ta gA ra d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse
mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dI skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
na| bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing
ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin
gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rdo rje chen po'i seng+ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong gis rnam par
mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pa
dang cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang gcig yungs tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan
pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid snyan cing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen
po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang /
byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba
dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / dben pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje
rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje nga ro dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpa chen po rdo rje tog ces bya ba
dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grel ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi
khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob po/ /lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par
bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dang / tsha dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa
'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa
gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la sogs
pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi lha'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris dang / stobs can dang
rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams
dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / mtha' yas
dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang
dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig snang 'chang gi rgyal po'i
g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos
kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i
g.yog can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / sring mo chen mo bdun dang / drang stong chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza'i lha thams cad
dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams
dang / yi dwags dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / re'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang /
'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa tshogs
bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po
chen po dang / sprin ta la dang / log 'dren dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang /
ma bdun dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor
du ma dang bcas pa dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang /
sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po tshad med dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / dus tshigs kyi lha dang / nub
ka'i lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / gnam sa'i lha thams cad dang yang thabs cig go/ /de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ shin tu
bskor| sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang / byang chub chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa brnyes pas ni/ shin tu yongs su bzung / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 'bar ba sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni
sku brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus ni/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rnam par spras/ spyi gtsug ni/ sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong /
bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni/ dkrugs/ de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni/ rim par thugs su chud/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni/ mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog
dang ni/ ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni/ ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni/ ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams
cad ni| bcom/ brjod pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcas pa ni/ 'phags/ khyu mchog dang / seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrog/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu gsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang /
stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po
brgyad cus sku brgyan pas ni/ mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la ni/ bzhugs te/ gdan rin po che dang / rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng+ge'i khri ri rab tsam
rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung ba/ rdo rje dag rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa pa legs par brten
pa| rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags
pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an+da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las du ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas
kun tu mdzes pa/ rin po che dang / rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/
dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mdzes par byas pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
'byor pas sa phyogs mdzes par gyur ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi
chos rnams kyis yang dag par rgyas par chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/
yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba yang dag par ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang bar
gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng+ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang
rnams na chos ston to/ /nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs cig go /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs
cig go /de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de dag thams cad kyang kun tu snang ngo / /
skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to/ /'on pa rnams ni/ sgra thos so/ /long ba rnams ni/ mig thob bo/ /smyon pa rnams
ni| dran pa rnyed do/ /nad pa rnams ni/ sos par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni/ bde bar btsas so/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni/ med
par gyur to/ /yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyis ming yang mi grags par
gyur to| |'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang / mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur to/ /der sems can
gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so/ /de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis
ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste mchog gis tshim par gyur nas kun tu bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas
de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so//
snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ /rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo / /bdud kyi ris
kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar du zhing skrag nas byer ro/ /bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi rnyi por gyur cing lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris kyi
lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa
dang / dge sbyong go'u ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'di la ltos/ des bdag cag phung ngo / /mtho brtsams so/ /phyogs gang na gnas su
gtol med do/ /longs la dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i gan du dong ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur gyi bar du gzhom mo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud
kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas rang rang gi gnas su dong ste lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ lus la go cha sna tshogs pa/
cha byad dang / rgyan sna tshogs can/ mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba/ mig dang / bzhin dang / skra kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba
dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud
la ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas ba de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung
zad kyang mi bskyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar brlag go /rnam par gzhom mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu
ste shin tu dga' bas spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud
kyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir khyab par byas te dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / lcags kyi sil
snyan dkrol ba dang / rnga po che brdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang / pi tsi zhes bya ba dang / zungs shig zungs shig /sod cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol
dang / gtun shing dang / gtun rked nyeg dang / phur bu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo
dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad cig de nyid la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung
nas bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen po 'gyur
par snang ngo / /bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / yang dag par 'gro ba'i sgra rnams su grag go /bdud
sdig can ni/ zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo / /de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba thob ste bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /bdud sdig can ni/ bdag nyid dgrol
bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams
chen por 'gyel to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
gyi khyams thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ bdud sdig can
'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan la bzhag ste rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi
rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / bdud sdig can 'di
sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / yi dwags dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang /
mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / zas su btsas pa za ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems
dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang /
dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa yang ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngan 'gro'i log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul
dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa/ /gzhig pa'i slad du 'dren par byung / /khyod ni bdud rnams kun
las rgyal/ /'jig rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod/ /thar ba'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam/ /ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus/ /yang dag brnyes nas thugs rje yis/ /snyan pa'i
gsung gis bstan pa mdzad/ /khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang / /shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis/ /bdag mdzad
slad kyis sems can btsud/ /khyod kyis chos rnams skye med par/ /bshad cing de bzhin rnam phye yang / /'bras bur dogs pa ma mchis pa/ /kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad
'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor/ /mu stegs can dang bdud btul te/ /chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad/ /nyon mongs brag
chen rnams kun tu/ /ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas/ /sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i/ /byang chub bla na med pa brnyes/ /gang gi mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub
sa bon nyid 'gyur ba/ /khyod ni 'jig rten mchog gcig pa/ /dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags/ /khyod ni mgon po khyod ni pha/ /khyod skyabs khyod
ni dpung gnyen lags/ /thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid/ /mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod/ /khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams/ /sems can dmyal las
rnam par dkrol/ /rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas/ /khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs/ /lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i/ /ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur
nas| |grol te 'jig rten rnams kyang grol/ /kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang / /mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi/ /dra bas 'jig rten khams khyab ste/ /mya ngan 'das las
lhag pa bde/ /lus can kun gyis thob par mdzad/ /khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcom pas/ /gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang / /gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs
rnams dang / /nor bu lam mer ma gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan
'das la mngon par bstod nas yang rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen
po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par
thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs
dma'| lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ steng mtho na 'og dma'/ 'og mtho na steng dma' bar gyur to/ /phyogs
thams cad dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
rdo rje'i yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa
dag byung bar kun tu snang ngo / /rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag na sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar
dge ba| don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi 'khor gyi khyams rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag na kun tu snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de
dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan sngar rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba rgya chen po des snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so
sor zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba rgya chen po kun tu gda' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis so so'i byang chub sems
dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
bya ba mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston to/ bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel pa migs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du gsang ba pa'i bdag
po lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /'di ni/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen
po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
mchod pa'i sprin dang / gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyan phreng gi sprin dang / dbu rgyan gyi sprin kyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod pa chen po
byas nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po
che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gnang
nas rang rang gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje tog ces bya ba de na
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes
te| 'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las brtsams te chos kyang ston to/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig
rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying
po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams
'di thams cad snang bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags dang /
gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi gda' bar gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te nub
phyogs su mchi bar 'da' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na rdo rje chen po'i ri
rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das des spyi gtsug gi
mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyung ste 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun tu khros
nas lha'i bu thams cad dang / gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir
lhags pa dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa lnga'i bcing pas bcings nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
'gyel te/ de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par bka'
lung byin nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te yan lag dang nying lag
gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/ 'di ni/ rdo rje de dag nyid rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te 'jig rten
gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mtshar thob par gyur pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang so sor zhus
so| |rigs kyi bu/ de nyid kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing
bsnyen bkur byed pa yang mthong ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu
'joms pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / gsang ba
pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de yang blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |rigs kyi bu/ de'i dus la da bab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lan bdun bskor
ba byas te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa
dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig smra ba na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa las grub pas
byin pa'i rin po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang sngon dang / ljang ser dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul dang / nor
bu dang / mu tig dang / gser dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / /rdo'i snying po dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an+da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las dang / go
mu ta ra ga dang / mu tig dkar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas
te steng gi ngar snang khyab par byas nas lha'i snang bas snang bar byas te 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jam pa/ mnyen pa/ rab tu gzhon pa/ sha rgyas pa/ snum pa/ long bu
gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/ pad+ma gsar du kha phye ba lta bu/ dung dang / nya dang / rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma dang / chu srin ma ka ra'i mtshan dang ldan pa
gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu
tshad shing ta'i 'phang lo tsam pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang / an+da rnyil dang / dngul dang / byi
ru dang / shel dang / ke ke ru dang / dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag mthon to/ /de la gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni/ an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung
ba dag go /snying po ni/ dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni/ byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni/ ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung
ba'o| |an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni/ dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go /snying po ni/ byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni/ shel gyi rgyu
las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni/ ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni/ dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni/ byi ru'i
rgyu las byung ba dag go /snying po ni/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni/ ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni/ dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni/
gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ sing po ni/ ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /
ze ba ni/ dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni/ an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi
'dab ma ni/ ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po ni/ dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni/ an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung
ba'o| |ze 'bru ni/ dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni/ dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni/ gser gyi
rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni/ an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni/ dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni/ byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /dun las kyi rgyu las
byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go /snying po ni/ an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni/ dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni/ byi
ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma dag go /rin po che'i
pad+ma re re la yang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mdzes pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum byung ngo / /'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che
thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i
khang phran gyi rtse mo la seng+ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dpyangs pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa/ pad+ma
rA ga dang / an+da rnyil dang / margad dang / bai DUR+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klad la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing
las gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par spras te/ mdzes par byas pa/ dngul gyi las byas pa'i phug ron gyi phreng gi mtha' mu tig dmar po dang ldan
pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sbyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur nas rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug ron dang / bya bang dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya'i
nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba/ khyams dang / 'dun khang chen po'i nyen kor stegs pus bskor bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las
byas pa'i sgo khang can/ shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa/ bkra shis kyi gser bum du ma nas chu dri zhim pos chag chag btab pa/ rdzing chen po
'gram gyi ne'u gsing margad kyi rgyu las byung ba ka tsi lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang /ngur pa
dang / ka lan+da ka'i khyu gnas pa/ gser gyi phye ma bdal ba'i gtos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyis phreng bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan
pa'i chus yongs su gang ba grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung ngo / /rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung ngo / /rin po che'i pad+ma re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas lha'i bu mo dag gla len
gar byed cing yongs su spyod do/ /sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ba de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo / /sbyin
dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing / /de bzhin bzod dang brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan la/ /bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gos kun 'byor
ba| |ye shes sgron ma de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan/ /thabs dang byang chub yan
lag ting 'dzin rnams kyi bdag /rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcu ldan pa yi/ /thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis/ /'dam rdzab nas ni
pad+ma rgyas pa ji bzhin du/ /gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa/ /'chi dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal ba yi/ /rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon
po de la blta phyir deng / /gcig kyang mi ldan min par gyur pa gang zhig gis/ /skye rgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing / /sku dang gsung dang thugs
kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba/ /shAkya'i tog ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/ /de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rnam
pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun tu snang ste/ kha cig tu ni/ rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kun tu snang ngo / /kha cig
tu ni| me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni/ go shiR+Sha'i tsan+dan dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni/ gos kyi phreng ba'i
sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni/ ka shi ka'i ras dang / du ku la'i ras dang / za 'og gi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig
tu ni| me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / ka tsa lin+da dang / ma hA ka tsa li da dang / btang bzung dang /
btang bzung chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /me tog gi char de dag las
dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab
bo| |'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur te sdug
bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshun 'dri ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul sna
tshogs ston pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /de dag gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal to/ /skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro
log par ltung bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / dad pa thob nas skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log
par ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bar snang la 'khod do/ /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'khor gyi khyams
chen po thams cad ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams bar snang las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang
pa brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin cing / tshul dang 'dra pa'i
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /gang slad ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi/ /ming yang bde gshegs
stobs kyis deng du mi mjed dang / /bsod nams mi ldan sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog /byams par mdzad pa kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung / /bdag cag rnams
kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi/ /sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgyid dka' sna tshogs pa/ /de dag thub pa'i bya dgas de ring glo bur du/ /skad cig tu ni ji ltar rnam par
zhig par 'gyur/ /ji ltar gdugs kyi mun pa mun nag kun bcom pa/ /ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams sreg pa dang / /bser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin
'thor ji bzhin du/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom/ /bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na/ /lhan cig skyes dbang 'od
zer dra bas sdig 'phrog pa/ /'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa zhig pa yi/ /thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /mig dang mgo dang snying dang sha khrag
tshil rnams dang / /srog dang sdug dang bu rnams rtswa ltar bor nas ni/ /mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa/ /'jig rten mgon sras de dag
rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yi dwags ltogs la chu dang ro brgya'i zas rnams dang / /de bzhin skye bo nor 'dod snying dang ldan pa la/ /thugs rje spyod cing rnam pa sna
tshogs tshim mdzad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabs su mchi/ /gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas/ /mchog tu tsha
ba'i sems can dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur/ /rang bde mi gzigs sams can brtson la thugs ldan pa/ /'jig rten mgon sras mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal
lo| |gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol/ /stong pa gsung yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhing / /ye shes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang thugs
rjes brlan/ /spyod pa brtag med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje snying po bde gshegs sras/ /mtshan gyis mtshan btab sku las 'od
stong mang byung ba'i/ /dri ba rnams dang sna tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim/ /skad cig gis ni dmyal las sum cu'i lha dbang gyur/ /bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal
dang rgyal sras rnams dang ni/ /de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la/ /gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa/ /des myur 'jig rten thams cad
bde gshegs thob par shog /de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ de
dag rang rang khri rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang ba brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po
dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te bla
gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la lta'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la
lta'o| |bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /dran pa'i gzhus
'phangs pa yi shes rab mda' mang gis/ /ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mdzad cing / /'jig rten nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa gsal
mdzad nas/ /bla ma sprin med zla ba bzhin du lhang nge 'o/ /dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba yis/ /'dul ba'i pad+ma'i gnas rnams kha phye nas/ /ye shes
nam mkha' che la dri med 'bar ba'i gzugs/ /nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdungs/ /mu stegs can gyi nga rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing / /'gro
ba'i 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad/ /dge ba'i lo tog rtsi chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa/ /dge ba'i char pa phab cing 'brug ltar bsgrag tu gsol/ /
mgon po mu stegs can gyi wa brgya pham mdzad cing / /bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam pa rab brnyes nas/ /ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyi mthu mnga'
ba| |skye ba'i 'jigs lam rab grol seng+ge ji bzhin sgrog /spyod ba zab cing brtan la brtags pas mi dpog pa/ /sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin
nor bu bkram/ /dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bo rnams 'dzin pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye rgu mchog gtso bo/ /tshul khrims bzang po'i rtsa ba sbyin
pa'i chus btab 'phel/ /byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pas mdzes/ /byang chub lam gyi yan lag 'bru chags 'dod byas bsten/ /bsod nams dpag
bsam shing khyod de ring ga las byung / /sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan/ /dpe byad bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing / /sa dang
dbang dang dam chos phur pa brtan btab pa/ /lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo khyod ni 'gro la mdzes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i
pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po
brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal byung ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog
ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin
du nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po mthu chen thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin
du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad 'byung ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du
rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i par du'o/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rab gsal dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal brtsegs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de
bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tshom dang bral ba nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun
du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag
thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
rin po che brtsegs pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas
yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i
snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis
gnang nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag kyang chos
mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te
mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu
de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bdud
kyi tsher ma dkrugs pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi sgrib pa las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i
pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas
de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma bstan pas gzhal med khang
dang / me tog gi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / phye ma'i sprin dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi sprin
dang / rin po che'i spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / bai DUR+ya dang / an+da snyil dang / byi ru dang / margad dang / mu tig dmar po dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi sprin dang /
dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i pad+ma du mas khebs pa'i gling gis legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjod du med par gtogs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
las shin tu 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin
gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan par kun tu snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang
ste 'jam zhing mnyen la rab tu gzhom zhing pad+ma dang / yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i ngos can gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang /
bum pa dang / nya dang / sgo khang dang / gzhal med khang dang / dung dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / dpal be'u dang / 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ tshe rabs bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag du ma nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu mthun pas mngon par grub pa'i dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras
pa| sen mo zangs 'dra zhing rgyas la snum zhing srab pa'i nor bu'i mdongs kyi me tog gi 'od zer gyis mkhrig ma mdzes par gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la
mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / yang dag par mthun pa'i phyag rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag
par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyi bo las byugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing 'di skad ces
kye rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir bdud sdig can dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad cing sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren drag shul can drag
shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / rnam par gzhig pa dang / de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa sems zhum pa brtson 'grus brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par
gzengs bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar bya ba nas khams gsum par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bar dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang /
sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir khyod rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsam
gyis mi khyab pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs pas grub pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos spras pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang
chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthu grub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nye bar zhi ba/
sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i dus kyi tsher ma ma lus par
'don pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong
ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor mngon par dga' ba can dag la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba du ma kun tu skyed pa la snyoms par
zhugs pa ni/ legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod
de rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang rang gis phyag bskum ste rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan du gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten
gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bkye'o/ /de dag gis gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos ji tsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi skad cig thang gcig
yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ bdud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings pa 'di las khrol la ci nas kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar
'gyur ba dang / chos la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin gang dag ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas
par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang ci nas khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang
ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so/ /zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la
snyoms par zhugs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par
byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul/
rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang me lce 'bar ba
gcig tu gyur te/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba rnon po drag po gzengs can 'jigs pa chen po skyed
pa gtsigs te mche ba mnan nas me lce chen po ltar sma ra ser zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug ste/ mi bzad pa rna ba las 'phyang ba'i sbrul dug 'thor ba dang /
ba lang sna lta bu dang / gzar bu lta bu dang / sbrul chen po kha gdangs pa'i kha nas byung ba'i mche ba'i rtse mo nas dug drag po 'bar ba 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phreng ba bzhin du
me 'bar ba/ lag pa stong phrag du ma la rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / gtun shing dang / gtun shing rked nyag dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags sgrog la sogs
pa thogs pa'i mtshon cha'i rtse mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang /
srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa sdang ba rab tu sdang ba rab tu sdang ba'i sems can
skrag par byed pa ri dwags kyi dbang po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa sham thabs su bgos pa/ sbrul chen po'i lus kyis rgya gram du dam du bcings pa/ 'jigs pa
bas kyang 'jigs par byed pa/ 'chi bdag kyang skrag par byed pa/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur nas lus kyi
tshigs thams cad las kyang khro bo kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nag po ste thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang
bzhin can khro gnyer mi mnyam pas rnam par spras pa'i gnyer ma'i khrem gnyer can gyi dpral ba'i dbyes nas me stag lta bu'i rdul gyi thigs pa
rtsub po 'dzag pa las/ dug 'chang rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu byung bas yan lag dang / nying lag kun tu dkris pa'i mngon rtags can du gyur cing rdo rje drag shul can
du snang ste/ mche bas mi bzad par 'dug pa'i kha gdangs pa las ha ha zhes gad mo rta gad 'byung zhing / 'jigs pa'i dus kyi rlung gis char pa dang bcas pa'i sprin
dkrugs pa las char gyi rgyun rags pa 'bab pas yongs su gang bas rgya mtsho dkrugs nas rlabs chen po g.yo ba dang rta rgod ma'i kha nas me byung ba lta bu'i hUM zhes
bya ba zab cing brtan pas rgyu ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs 'jigs skrag ste 'byer zhing 'thor nas sdangs te skyabs 'dong zhing 'dud pas/ nyi ma stong bas 'bar ba'i lus
rnams mthong ba na sna sgar sgur can zhom pa lta bu bu ga zab mo'i sbubs kyi nang nas sbrul sna tshogs 'khyil ba'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od kyis 'gram pa rnam par
mdzes pa/ glog stong 'dus pa ltar ser zhing dmar ba'i mig gi 'bras bu'i 'od zer gyis skra'i tshogs rtsub shing gshor la gyen du 'greng ba'i rtse mo brgyan cing
'dres te gsal bar gyur pa/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing / sbrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / ska rags dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / rna
chas lus brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba dri ma med cing drag shul can/ mi bzad pa lag na thogs pa/ mdzub mo rnams las hUM zhes bya ba'i seng+ge'i sgra chen po dag gis bgegs
dang / log 'dren thams cad kun tu bsdigs pa dag thon te/ gang de dag gi mig dang / kha rnams nas gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra chen po'i tshogs las me lce chen po 'bar
ba'i tshogs kyi snang ba byung ste/ des sdang ba'i bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig ba can sdig pa'i sems
dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams tshig par byed do/ /rmongs par byed do/ /'tshog par byed de/ mi zad pa drag pa rtsub pa sdug bsngal ba yid du
mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed do/ /de dag tshor bas nyen pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ngo / /de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis bgegs dang / log 'dren de
dag tshor ba chen pos nyen te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ba mthong nas 'jigs sdangs skrag ste skyabs ma rnyed nas rlung drag pos bskyod pa'i shing bzhin du 'dar/
rab tu 'dar te/ du bar 'dod na yang du ma nus nas ri mo bzhin du lus thams cad g.yo ba med par gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na
