bde legs shog /rkang med khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong rnams kyang bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs
rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /gling 'dir char phob don
rnams kyis/ /sa dang bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye rgu rnams la byams byed shog /char med than pa byung ba'i tshe/ /sngags chen dang po brgya bzla'o/ /bar ma lnga bcu bzla/ tha ma bdun
bzla bar bya'o/ /sprin la blta zhing bar bar sus kyang ma tshor bar shub bur bzla'o/ /grangs las thal na/ ser bar 'gyur bas sdig che'o/ /klu gnad la gtad pa yin pas sdig che'o//
lan grangs yang yang mi gdab bo/ /zhag gcig gam/ zhag gnyis sam/ zhag lngar char gyi rgyun mi 'bab mi srid do/ /chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba/ /kun gyi smon lam myur du
'grub 'gyur shog /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag rnams yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lcags mchu nag po'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya lo ha duN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes
bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyu zhing a mra'i
tshal du gshegs te byon nas a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ lha ma yin rnams dang / mi rnams ni/ bstan pa la gnod par bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ lha ma yin dang / 'khor du mi gtogs pa'i bstan pa la yun ring
bar gnod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi bas mi 'dul na/ bdag la drag pos 'dul ba'i chos bstan du gsol/ theg pa'i chos dgra srung du
gsol| de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i dbang po/ khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin ba'i
lcags mchu'i gzungs ma rungs pa 'joms pa/ don thams cad byed pa/ dam ba'i chos srung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams
cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs bar byed ba/ theg ba'i chos dgra srung pa/ rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi thams
cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang gnyis thams cad skrag tu 'jug pa/ dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za
dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang /
brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon
phung bar byed pa/ zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba phung bar byed ba/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang /
'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa phung bar byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod ba dang / 'tshang 'bru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs
nam mkha' lding drag po'i gzungs 'di zungs shig /bstan pa la gnod pa skrag par byed pa/ char drag po dang / ser ba drag bo 'bebs par byed pa'i gzungs brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/

e he me te/ pra me ta tra/ go le bo le le bos so/ mot+te pa da te/ khA rat+te/ khA ra Ne/ gA nA gA ne/ nA ga pu ga Ne/ mo ne pra hI mo ne/ kA li pra kA li tsaN+De/ mahA tsaN+De/ pra ti tsaN+De/ be ge so na/

go nA mo hA/ pra mo hA/ mahA mo TA/ pra mo hA/ nA sha ni/ pra nA sha nA d+hi pra ti/ bal gA ni/ pra ba la gA Ni/ nid d+ya Ni/ pA Ni ThA ni/ kro d+ha ni/ pra ti kro d+ha ni/ ha na ha na/ bi ha na bi ha na/ sarba
duSh+Ta pra duSh+TAn/ nA sha ya sarba a b+ha ya pra de hUM phaT/ sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul lo/ /gnod pa thams
cad kha bub tu brgyal lo/ /ske tshe dang / nyungs nag tu bsres la chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / ri bo la gtor ro/ /de phyin chad char 'bebs par byed do/ /yang chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu
mig dang / rdzing bu/ lu ma/ 'bab chu gnyan rgur bu ram/ sbrang / shing mngar/ sha ka ra/ klu sman sna tshogs 'o ma la bsngags la gtor ro/ /de'i phyir ser ba chen po 'bebs so/ /
yid zlos bgyis te sprin la bltas la lha phyag bya zhing bzlas na/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i ser ba chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab can gyis 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs
'di zungs shig /chongs shig /rjod cig /gzhan la ma spel cig/ sbos shig /thun mong du min no/ /rgya mtsho'i chu rngo bzhin mi mngon par sbos shig /
gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i drag po'i gzungs 'thab pa'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'gyed pa'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo
la byang bu gzugs so/ /sngags pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dang gang gis yid rtse gcig tu bya'o/ /dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang /
dge tshul ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung ba bstan pa la gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir yid la zungs shig /chongs shig /de skad ces bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya lo ha duN+De nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags
kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
yul ma ga d+ha nas rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha ma yin rnams ni/ rab tu lha rnams kyi yun ring bo'i dgra lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa'i chos bstan du gsol/ 'dzam bu'i
gling pa'i 'jig rten shAkya thub pa'i zhing khams na mir gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor na dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge bsnyen pha
dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa la srung ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /lha'i dbang po/ khyod kyis lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs/ thams cad skrag par byed pa/ lha ma yin la thog smad lnga 'bebs pa/ 'jig rten gyi rims nad zhi bar byed
pa| 'jig rten thams cad du zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang med pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs
par byed pa/ dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / 'gro
ba drag shul du spyod pa rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'phags pa lcags mchu 'di zungs
shig /thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs kyi sngags brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ba ga tsa ni/ shu ti shu ma li/ ga sha sha sha ta ta bI ra ti/ hu yu hu yu ri ti swAhA/
rgya mtsho la 'bar li ti gtor ro/ /ji ltar 'dod pa 'bab bo/ /klu'i gnas su phur bu sa ya bye ba grangs med pa bzlas la klu'i gnas su btab na/ ser ba dang / thog ji ltar 'dod
pa bzhin du 'bab bo/ /sarba nA gA nAM a pa bIR+yA phob/ nA ga shar shar phob/ nA ga rak+Sha phob/ ri tsa sri badzra hUM phaT/ drag po yul khams kyi dgrar gyur pa zlog pa/ mes gtor ba'i
thog smad lnga 'bebs pa/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs 'a di lha ma yin rmongs su 'jug pa/ 'khor rnam bzhi srung ba/ theg pa chen po'i
chos dgra srung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
pa lcags mchu'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya kuN+Da l+ya mr-i ta hr-i da ya tsa tur nA ma d+hA rA NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i
gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa
thams cad la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di'i sems can rnams ni/ bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul la
mi gnas pa dang / pha ma la ma gus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang / dad pa ma mchis pa dang / glags tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang / rtag tu log 'dren dang / 'tshe ba dang /
sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang / mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje
khro bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor/ gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa legs so legs so/ /khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi /sems can
thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sngags shod cig /de nas khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ pra dz+wa la ti dIp+ta/ taM Sh+TA+o te ka Ta/ b+ha ya b+he ra ya/ a si mus la/ badzra ba ra shu bA sha hastA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ a mr-i ta kun+Da la ni/ kha kha kha kha/ kha na kha na/ khA da khA da/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ gardza

gardza/ tardza tardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ b+ha ga wAn/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da lI/ mur+b+hA na tA Da ya badzre Na/ sarba big+h+na na/ bi nA ya ka na/ ni bA ra ya/ mahA ga Na pa ti dzI bi tA na ta/ kA rA ya

hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM kro d+ha ga Na pa ta ye swAhA/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang po'o/ /na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/ na mo mahA badzra krod+hA

ya daMSh+To ta ka Ta/ b+he ra wA ya/ a si baSh+Tha na hastA ya/ he he/ pa ta pa ta/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da lI/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ ga Na

pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta kA rA ya swAhA/ gsang sngags gnyis pa'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ na mo badzra krod+hA ya/ ba mi la ka na ka/ dz+wa

la b+hu Sha NI ya/ ga ga na a mr-i ta saM b+ha bA ya/ rak+ta mA l+ya/ a nu le ba ni pri yA ya/ badzra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badzra pa Ni hu l+ya/ ba ga yA/ de ba nA ga yak+Sha rak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa pra mAr+tha nA

ya |trai lo kya go tsa rA ya/ sha ta sain+ya baM drA pa ka rA yA/ tri rat+na gar+b+ho t+ta ta mA ya/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ e h+ye hi daMSh+Tota ka ta b+hai ra bA ya/ ga ga ni bi d+yU da dz+wa la sbu ling+ga shin tu l+ya ru bo d+hi tA/ saM

b+hu ta oM/ kha kha kha kha/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kA nAM/ hr-i da ya phaT/

gan+d+harba hr-i da yaM phaT/ rak+Sha hr-i da yaM phaT/ brah+ma rAk+Sha sa hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba dz+wa ra hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba tsa tur+tha ka hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba nA ga naM hr-i da yaM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/

A bi sha A bi sha/ i dany+tsa me kAR+yaM/ ku ru badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o/ /na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ daMSh+To t+ta kA Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ kha kha/

khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swAhA/ khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o/ /de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang / bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs
na| bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bton cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang / bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'tshal lo/ /de la 'di ni/ bdag gi snying po lags so/ /
oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /log 'dren
rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du
gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo thur du gtugs so/ /kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon
cig /rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo shags sa re/ ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom
pa dang / gtubs pa dang / brdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / bskams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig /nga'i mthu dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par
gyis shig /gang 'di gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / de srung ba byed pa de la glags ma tshol cig /til sgrus pa'am/ zas ngan pa za yang rung / grong gi chos
spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig /zan za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe lan bdun
brjod na/ de'i phyir bzhin rtag tu 'brang ngo / /log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi tshol lo/ /til dang / sran chung dang / 'bras dang / spen tse yang rung / snum 'khur par pa ta dang /
la phug kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyang zar zin kyang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin na/ de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/ /'phags
pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mahA ba la nA ma mahA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri btang bzung chen po na chos ston to/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa yang de
nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyag gis sems can rnams dbugs 'byin cing shar phyogs na me lce kun tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i pad+ma'i gdan la
bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lag pa bzhi pa lag pa gcig na ni/ rnga yab thogs/ lag pa gcig gis ni/ phyag 'tshal/ g.yas pa na ni/ be
con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni/ zhags pa thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba'o/ /de'i 'og na ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /g.yas
na ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so/ /g.yon na ni/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/ /de nas snying po rnams ni/ zla ba kham blta bur gzhag go /snying
po ni| ki li ki la dang / 'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang / lus dmar po dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyan chen te/ snying po'i mchog go /rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag po
chen po dang nye ba na ni/ 'phags pa mA ma kI'o/ /'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na ni/ rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud do/ /sgo'i nang logs su ni/ khro bo rdo rje'i tho ba
dang / rdo rje'i be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par gzhag go /g.yon logs su ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni/ gos dkar mo'o/ /de'i 'og tu ni/ sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can no/ /g.yon du rig sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo / /de bzhin du shar phyogs su ni/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang po'o/ /me'i phyogs na ni/ me'i lha drang srong
chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /lho phyogs su ni/ gshin rje dang / khyab 'jug go/ bden bral phyogs su ni/ srin po'i bdag po ma mos bskor ba'o/ /nub phyogs su ni/ klu'i
bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ni/ rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /byang phyogs su ni/ lus ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni/
dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med
grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
na rdo rje/ mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ki li ki li badzra/ kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ spyi gtsug la swAhA/ dpral ba la swAhA/ mig la swAhA/ drag shul can la swAhA/ shin tu drag shul can
la swAhA/ rdo rje'i zhags pa la swAhA/ lus dmar po la swAhA/ lag na rdo rje la swAhA/ lag na zhags pa la swAhA/ lag na ral gri la swAhA/ lag na dgra sta la swAhA/ gzhu 'dzin la swAhA/
gtun shing 'dzin la swAhA/ lag na 'khor lo la swAhA/ lag na mdung rtse gsum la swAhA/ snying po la swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po la swAhA/ drag po la swAhA/ kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ byis pa kI li
ki la la swAhA/ dmar po kI li kI la la swAhA/ stobs po che la swAhA/ ral pa can la swAhA/ gsus 'phyang bo la swAhA/ khro bo 'chol pa la swAhA/ gshin rje la
swAhA| srin po la swAhA/ srin po ya mun la swAhA/ drag po chen po la swAhA/ sbrin la swAhA/ ri 'dzin la swAhA/ ri btang bzung 'dzin la swAhA/ rdo rje'i be con la swAhA/ 'jigs
byed chen po la swAhA/ lus 'jigs byed la swAhA/ sdigs byed la swAhA/ rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la swAhA/ rdo rje'i gtan pa la swAhA/ rdo rje lus la swAhA/ 'gro lding ba la swAhA/ bdud
rtsi la swAhA/ dka' thub 'dzin la swAhA/ lcags kyu la swAhA/ don yod la swAhA/ gtsug tor rgyal po la swAhA/ mdog dkar po la swAhA/ sngo bsangs mdog la swAhA/ 'phyang po
la swAhA/ glang po la swAhA/ ba lang 'phal gyi lag pa la swAhA/ bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la swAhA/ sbrul gyi ske rags can la swAhA/ rdo rje'i phur pa la swAhA/ lag pa gnyis ka
la swAhA/ a rdo rje la swAhA/ 'bar ba'i 'od byed pa la swAhA/ blo gros brtan pa'i rdo rje la swAhA/ myu gu la swAhA/ 'od byed la swAhA/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la swAhA/ rdo rje'i dra ba
la swAhA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed la swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur la swAhA/ sprin rnam par 'thor ba la swAhA/ char pa rnam par rton pa la swAhA/ rdo rje lcags kyu la swAhA/ rdo rje'i snying po la swAhA/
rdo rje nye ba'i snying po la swAhA/ mthe bo'i rgyal po la swAhA/ be con gyi rgyal po la swAhA/ go cha'i rgyal po la swAhA/ oM d+h+rI oM/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde

dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT swAhA/ oM a mr-i ta hUM phaT swAhA/ yul 'khor srung la swAhA/
mig mi bzang la swAhA/ 'phags skyes po la swAhA/ lus ngan po la swAhA/ dbang po la swAhA/ me lha la swAhA/ drang srong chen po thams cad la swAhA/ nyi ma la swAhA/ zla ba la swAhA/
gshin rje la swAhA/ khyab 'jug la swAhA/ srin po'i bdag po la swAhA/ klu'i bdag po la swAhA/ rlung lha la swAhA/ dbang bdag la swAhA/ dbang bdag gi chung ma la swAhA/ brgya byin la
swAhA/ nor lha'i bu la swAhA/ rdo rje chen po la swAhA/ tshangs pa chen po la swAhA/ sa la swAhA/ dbyangs can la swAhA/ lha mo dpal la swAhA/ lha mo dka' thub zlog la swAhA/ rig sngags
chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'chang zhing yid la byed na/ srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad
'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas brtan blo
gros chen po shAr dwA ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mahA mu ni/ ki li ki li/ mahA ki li

ki li/ hI ge/ ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta/ mahA kaT/ sha ma sha ma sha ma/ mahA sha ma/ shA tri shA tri shA tri/ shAn+ta shAn+ta shAn+ta/ dAn+ta dAn+ta dAn+ta/ d+hI ra d+hI ra d+hI ra/ mahA me g+hA dur+d+ha ra/ ha ri ha

ri ha ri/ kuT+Ti kuT+Ti kuT+Ti/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da b+hin+da/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta/ gu mu gu mu gu mu/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ pra maM da ma ni da ma ni/ Ta Ta Ta/ ThA ThA ThA/ DA DA DA/ DA DA DA/ tsa tsa tsa/ tsa tsa tsa/

pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha da ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ sha ba ri sha ba ri sha ba ri/ ma tAM gi/ tsaN+Da li/ hu hu hu/ dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu/ ha ta pra t+yaR+tha ni/ tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phaT phaT

phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tiSh+Tha tha tiSh+Tha tha tiSh+Tha tha/ mA ti pra ma tha/ mA tAM gi/ hUM hUM hUM/ he he he/ gal te mi 'dug na lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / kha dang / mid pa dang / mig dang / snying dang /

ngag thams cad bcing ngo / /dbrog go /dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ duM d+hu duM d+hu duM d+hu/ baM d+hu baM d+hu baM d+hu baM d+hu/ nI la nI la nI lAM ga badzra d+ha ra/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis

shig /ko Ti ko Ti ko Ti ni/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ badzra mA li/ badzra d+ha ra/ badzra aT+Ta hA sa/ tsartu nartu martu/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ hu ru hu ru hu ru/ sems can chen po dran bar gyis shig /hUM hUM hUM /he

he he| phaT phaT phaT/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ mahA tsaN+Da/ hurtu hurtu hurtu/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ badzra pA Ni/ ha na ha na/ ma ma sar+b+ba sha trU NAM/ mUrti tA Da ya phaT/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/
lag na rdo rje'i las dang 'gal bar ma byed cig /dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na/ dam tshig dral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bslus par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi

gzhi ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /tsu tsu tsu/ ha ra ha ra/ phaT+Tu phaT+Tu phaT+Tu/ ta pa ni ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pa tsa ni pa tsa ni pa tsa ni/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs
pa dran par gyis shig /tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phu lu phu lu phu lu/ phu phu phu/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi snying po 'di dang 'gal bar bgyis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs
pa'i mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig /da ra phu/ tsa ra phu/ na ra phu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par
gyur cig /swAhA/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA/ rdo rje 'dzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas de'i tshe de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams las 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar bar kun tu snang ngo / /de ltar
gyur pa dang / bdud sdig can ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te bgegs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed do/ /de
nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ngo /
de nas de ltar gyur pa dang / khro bo 'chol ba mdog dmar po/ sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/ /mche ba gtsigs pa/ mi bzad pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na
be con thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung nyi shu rtsa
gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das shing / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang kun tu snang ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can dang / bgegs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
brgya khro bor tshol bas 'dar bar 'gyur to/ /bdud sdig can myos shing gzir te phongs nas srog la mi lta ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhags pas bcing pa lngas bcings
so| |de ltar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
sna tshogs la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la ci nus kyis mchod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te mngon par dga' bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lha dang mi
rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che
stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/ /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par
rab tu ston tam/ bsti stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod par byed na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang
sngags thams cad bshig pa dang / bcom pa dang / bsgyel bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis rig sngags mchog gi
rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smras so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas don 'dod pa thams cad
sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi d+h+waM sa ya/ dza Ti
la bo da ra/ utsuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ rim gror bgyid dam/ mchod
par bgyid na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ stobs po che'i snying po 'dzin pa la ni/ gnod
sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin gyi bu'am/ srin po'am/ srin po'i bu'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi bu'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding gi bu'am/ klu'am/
klu'i bu'am/ dri za'am/ dri za'i bu'am/ sha za'am/ sha za' bu'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed kyi bu'am/ mkha' 'gro 'am/ mkha' 'gro'i bu'am/ sgrub pa'am/ sbrul 'dzin
bcas pa la sogs pa dang / brjed byed dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs la sogs pa dang / gnon po'i gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad kyis mi
tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs
so/ /stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / bskor

bar bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnod pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/

oM hUM hUM hUM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa drag shul can/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ta ni rnA di/ hUM hUM hUM/ oM oM oM/ phaT phaT phaT/ stobs po che la swAhA/
oM rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ ha na da ha ba tsa ma tha bi ki ra/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya dza Ti laM bo da ra/ u tsuSh+ma ko d+ha hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ staM b+ha ya/ staM
b+ha ya| du rA rA/ duSh+Tan ni bA ra ya/ bdag la srung shig srungs shig swAhA/ oM a nan+ta/ bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da hUM phaT swAhA/ oM d+h+r-i ka hUM phaT/ oM shri re ye/ shi ro mA li ni/ si ni

si ni| shi shi ni shi shi ni/ oM sar+b+ba At+ma dza/ ma hA te dza badzra/ a sha ni badzra/ pA sha a nu/ pra bi sh+ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ta/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ hUM phaT/ oM hUM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM a nan+ta/

bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN+De/ hUM phaT/ oM phaT phaT/ badzra krod+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra ka d+ha ka ri ka ra ka ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la d+ha ka d+ha ka /dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM bi

pu ra rak+Sha badzra/ prany+dza ra hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li/ badzra badzri b+hu ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA pa la A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la/ da ra da ra/ dA ra ya dA ra
ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la/ ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya/ pa Ta ya pa Ta ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ta Ta ya ta Ta ya

hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dzra la pra dz+wa la/ di pya da pyi/ dI pa ya dI pa ya/ hUM phaT/ oM tsu ru tsu ru/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha/ shi kha ra ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ dkon mchog
gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod spyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM badzra kro d+ha mahA tsaN+Da ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi ki ra bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ bcom ldan
'das tshur gshegs/ tshur gshegs/ ha na ha na/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bdag pos mchod pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid

las skyes pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ kur+b+ba kur+b+ba/ mahA kurba/ bi kurba/ ku naT+Ti/ ku naT+Ti/ na Ti na Ti/ shi ni shi ni/ khi ni khi ni/ kha kha/ khA
hi khA hi/ ku ru ku ru/ tu Ta tu Ta/ tuT+Ta tuT+Ta/ traT+Ta traT+Ta/ tu ru tu ru/ 'byung po'i bdag po/ klu'i bdag po/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer rnam par 'joms par byed pa khro bo 'chol pa stobs

po che/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru su ru/ hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ hr-IHhUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu swAhA/ oM

badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la sar+b+ba duSh+paM/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya hUM phaT/ oM ha ha/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ oM bi sa ra/ saM trA sa ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba

la| ha ra ha ra/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM hUM/ mA mA/ ma ma phaT/ oM d+h-i ka kro d+ha na/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/ oM mahA ba la badzra d+ha ra/ ka ra ka ra/
ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT swAhA/ oM dz+wa la gra sa u tsuSh+ma sA ga ra hUM/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang srung ba dang / yongs su srung ba dang / skyob pa dang /
sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni/ dge bar 'gyur/ dug mi gnod par 'gyur/ shi ba sos par byed par 'gyur/ dgra rnams
kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bu mang bar 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs kyang 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang nus par
'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa rnams la ni/ skyor chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang / bu mo yang
bde bar btsas par 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di zhag gsum bcangs na/ rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun bcangs na/ zhib chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag
rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang
pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa dang / stobs
dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ lag na rdo rje dga' ba/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / ro langs dang /
lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa/ smyo byed dang / skrod pa dang / gsod pa dang / skem byed dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa las
thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'byung
po'i bdag po dbang bdag la 'byung po'i bdag po legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sbar te/ rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs
nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems
can thams cad la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer 'bar ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi dga' ba kun tu ston ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / bdud thams cad kyi yul 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs po
che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes sdom bag can du rdo rje sbar te/ de nas rdo rje pad+ma la gnas ba'i tshul gyis gnas te thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo 'chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs so/ /zhugs ma thag tu khro bo 'chol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te gzir bar bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo / /de dag tshig nas smre zhing srog btang ste/
sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyam thag pa'i skrad kyis dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du son nas bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su bskyab tu
gsol/ byang chub sems dpa'/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo 'chol pas gzir cing myos te 'phongs
nas srog la yang mi blta'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ kye
ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /mthu che ba'o/ /de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de de bzhin te/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /
mthu che ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje seng+ge'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas 'byung po'i bdag po khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil

'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ dza Ti laM bo d+ha ra/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ a a mo mo swAhA/ grogs po dag /gang
la la zhig khro bo stobs po che 'di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la drag
po'i las dang / nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la bgegs dang / mi dang / rnam par log 'dren gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams cad dga' bar
'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /'dir zhugs na/ gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo thams cad kyi cho ga yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub
par 'gyur ro/ /'dir dbang bskur na/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal gyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo chen po lan
khris sngar spyad par byas te khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ rgyud shes pa/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ gsum la skyabs
su dong ba/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje can du gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba/ bla ma rnams kyi lung byin pa/ gang
bdud thams cad dang / sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jigs par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de bdud dang / dgra thams cad kyis
mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / lus srul po dang / mkha' 'gro dang / brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas
pa la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /gsod pa dang / bcing ba
thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /bcad pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las
thar par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ rjes su dran par byed na/ dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /lo nyes pa byung
ba'i tshe stobs po che lan bdun bklags na/ sprin chen po las char 'bab bo/ /gal te char mi 'bab na/ sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog bskams bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po
dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis sprin chen po las char 'bebs so/ /gal te char mi 'bebs na/ srog bskams par
'gyur ro/ /gong du smos pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs kyi cha'am/ rlung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam/ mchod rten gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te tsan+dan dmar po dang / ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po la sogs pa'am/
bum pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de dag g.yul ngo thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur
ro| |sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul
ngor song na/ pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags gro ga la bris te spyi bor btags na/ g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin
du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags zhes gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ chos so/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba
ni| chos kyi phung po'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi tshul lo/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa chen po'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ lag na rdo rje'o/ /de nas
bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su
mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so legs so/ /dge bsnyen gyi yan lag gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bde dang thar dang mtho ris dang / mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni/ /
dam pa kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /stobs po che ni gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas bdud sdig can chos la 'ga' zhing yid bde ba dang rangs pa gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug
bsngal las thar par byed pa'o/ /de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa mtha' yas par gling bzhi la dbang pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur
ro| |bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i snying po 'di ni/ gtsang sbra can nam/ gtsang sbra med pa'am/ smyung
bar byas pa'am/ smyung bar ma byas pa'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la sten pa la'ang 'grub par byed do/ /de la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyid na 'dug par gyur
pas| bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni/ ci zhig stsol ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris shig /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni/ ci zhig sbyin par bgyi/ lag na
rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed do/ /gos sbyin par byed do/ /dngul sbyin par byed do/ /gser sbyin par byed do/ /ba lang sbyin par byed do/ /dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin
par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ci'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ sems can nyon mongs
pas bsgribs pa rnams ni/ 'bras bu'i dus su gnas so/ /'bras bu'i dus kyi yon tan gyi don du gnas so/ /yon tan gyi don gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jog par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ /stobs po che ni shes rab ldan/ /
gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs/ /spyi nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhungs/ /mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims shes rab che/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing
stobs kyang che/ /dbang cher grags shing bsod nams che/ /yon tan rtse mo stobs po che/ /mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir/ /sangs rgyas brgyad stong der gshegs so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi bor bzhag ste dge ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis gzungs 'di sa'am/ ri'am/ klung gi
dogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bcangs na/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bro nad ma mchis par lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur
ro| |lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mdo sde 'di ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /chos kyi zla ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /don thams cad grub pa ces bya bar
yang zungs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya bar yang zungs shig /sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya bar yang zungs
shig /rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ su mdo sde 'di
'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des 'das pa dang / ma
'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
byung ba rnams kyis mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa la mchod par byas par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs so legs so/ /shin tu zab pa'i
chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu gang mdo
sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sems can rnams chu 'gram gyi shing ltar ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la
sogs pas mchod pa byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de la bar chod mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di gnas gang yang rung ba na 'chang
na| lha dang / mir bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byed na/ sangs
rgyas brgyad stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / dri zar bcas pa rnams dgyes dga'o/ /stobs po
che'i gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ su mdo sde la gus par mi
byed pa de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ su mdo sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang /
mchod pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge 'bri'am tshig mnyan na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na
rdo rjes gsol pa/ thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shin tu phra ba/ shin tu zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sems can rnams kyi nang nas gang log par sems
pa de myos par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o/ /sems
can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar par bya ba dang / dpal gyis byin gyis brlab
par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o/ /de'i phyir de bzhin
gshegs pa brgya stong dang bar mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu
bshad pa legs so zhes mngon par dgyes par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dag /legs
par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po che'i gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' lag
na rdo rjes sdang ba bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi snying 'dar zhing 'gul bar mthong ngo / /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon

chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ha na ha na badzra badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ka Te ka
Te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te/ a pa ra dzI te/ ma ra sai n+ya pra marda ni ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ rnam par log 'dren thams
cad sdigs shig /chings shig /rnam par chongs shig /ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig /grub pa rnams dul bar gyis shig /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad 'bab par gyis shig /lha dang / klu thams cad tshur shog tshur shog /ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las
langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed thams cad kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'du byed thams cad ni/ dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ glog dang sprin dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ khyim dang /
dbu ba dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ mar me dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ chu shing dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams
cad ni/ ri mo'i rnam pa dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ me tog dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ rmi lam dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed 'di dag ni/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi
'khor lo dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed 'di dag ni/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi klung dang 'dra'o/ /'khrug par 'gyur bas rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o/ /skar ma dang 'dra'o/ /sems can rnams ni/
'du byed 'di dag skye bar mi sems/ mi mthong / mi shes/ mi 'jal gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gzigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis
'jal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /'du byed thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid du mtshan nyid gcig par mkhyen to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
du mkhyen to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du
mkhyen to/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ mtshan nyid 'di nyid mthong zhing mtshan nyid 'di shes te spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde 'di
mchan nyid gang gis ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs
pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan nyid des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /mdo
sde 'di yongs su nub pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su nub par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di 'tsho
zhing sdod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'tsho zhing sdod de/ mtshan nyid des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyang mdo sde 'di nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan nyid des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la rjes
su yi rang nas bka' lung bzhin bgyi zhing / su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i gnad du mchi 'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyang 'ong ngo / /lha thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /legs so legs so/ /bdag cag kyang dam pa stsal
par mngon par dga' ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dam pa 'di nyid stsol ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ stobs po che'i gsang ba pa'i snying po ni/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das/ mtshan nyid gang gis na mdo sde 'di chos kyi dbyings
sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i nyin mo ri btang bzung
chen por mdo sde 'di nyid kyis chos bstan te/ mtshan nyid des na/ chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad sems dang po bskyed pa gnas te/ mtshan nyid des na/ chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa
dag rgyun du zhugs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sras su 'du shes bskyed do/ /'khor de nyid du
'chi ba'i dus byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par mdzad do/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba bgrod dkar sems can gyi/ /srid pa'i phur pa
'byin cing shes rab kyis/ /srid phur sems klung 'joms shing thub pa yi/ /chos bstan pas ni sdig 'joms chos legs spyod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag
na rdo rje/ legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston
pas bsod nams kyi phung po ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/ /
rim gror byed par 'gyur ro/ /mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang dbul lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' la yang bde bar sbyar ba sgrub bo/ /dge 'dun gyi tshogs la yang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis
chos bstan pa de la yang bsti stang du byas te nyan to/ /'dzin to/ /klog go/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ji lta ba dang mtshungs par stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur
ro| |stobs po che pha rol gnon pa'i khro bo 'di'i mthus bdag dang sems can thams cad/ swasti swasti/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang
gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lag na rdo rje yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya big+ha na bi nA ya kA da tra d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i gzungs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na| bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang / dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

ta d+ya thA/ na ma stu te/ ka Ta ka Ta/ da ra da ra/ Da ha Da ha/ grih+Na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ na mastu te/ ru ru tsa tsa ye swAhA/ a b+hu trA bi na duHkhaM many+tse d+d+hA ba ra sa gats+tsha ti ha ha ya/ mahA
haste t+k+Sha ta nan/ pra go ba ye mo/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ na mo na ma swAhA/ nang par langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas la chu khyor ba gang steng dang / 'og gi phyogs su
gtor cig dang / bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ gsang sngags sgrub par 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te lag pa la bcings na/ rig
sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan gcig bklags
na yang bgegs rnams bar chad mi byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
gu gul ser po dang / pha waM gi rtug pa kun la bsku ba'i rtug pa sbyar ba'i du bas bdugs na 'go ba'i nad pa'i gan du phyin yang mi tshugs/ gos pa la thug na myur du sel/ khyim du
'byung po gnod pa dag la rab tu bsngags so// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA ya k+Sha se na pa ta ye na ra ku pa ra kalpa/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gar
mkhan mchog gi brtag pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin bdag po nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /'od zer dpag
med sdang ba 'dul mdzad pa/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro don ma lus mdzad/ /bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na bzhugs te/ grangs med pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /
nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mthu bo che dang / lha chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang
gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / stobs chen po'i stobs dang / dga' ba'i dbang po dang / nag po chen po dang / bi shwa ra dang / ma mo'i tshogs dang / gsang ba la gnas
pa dang / gru bzhi'i ri na gnas pa dang / 'bod sgrog dang / rnam par 'bod sgrog dang / rnam par 'jigs byed dang / rin chen gsang ba dang / rab gnas gsang ba dang / mtha'
yas gsang ba dang / rab mchog mche ba dang / mche ba 'khyil ba dang / mche ba rno ba dang / rda mo'i rkang pa can dang / ba lang gi mgo bo can dang / rgyal ba'i drang srong dang / a da pa ka
dang / rab tu 'joms pa dang / 'od byed dang / rab tu gzi brjid ldan pa dang / shin tu 'od dang / yang dag shes dang / mig bzang dang / rtog 'dod dang / gser gyi ba spu can
dang / gser gyi skra can dang / rnam par 'khyil ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'bar bar smra ba dang / mi'i thod pa can dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / dpung bzang dang / pan tsi
ka dang / me tog mche ba can dang / gtsug na me tog dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / nor gyi bdag po dang / rab tu gsang ba dang / rab tu ldan pa dang / shugs drag
po'i lus dang / nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / dga' ba'i nyi ma dang / mche ba gtsigs pa dang / 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang / 'bar ba'i 'od dang / dpa' ba'i 'od dang /
'jigs byed 'od dang / kun tu gnas pa dang / de dag la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po grangs med pa brgya stong gis bskor te bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan sngar lhags nas 'khod do/ /rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang po yang lhags nas 'khod do/ /gnas brtan chen po shA ri'i bu la sogs pa
nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po dang / rig 'dzin chen po'i 'khor tshogs pa nye bar lhags so/ /drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa grangs med pa lhags so/ /lag na rdo rje
gnod sbyin gyi dbang po yang 'khor mang pos bskor te lhags so/ /ngal bso ba'i bu gar mkhan mchog lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dbang po de mthu bo che'i cha lugs 'dzin te/
cha lugs bzang po/ zhal bzang po/ sku bzang po/ phyag bzang po/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs 'khyil ba 'chang ba dang / dbu bzang po dang / spyan bzang po sna tshogs pa'i me
tog gis mnyam par brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma dang zla ba las lhag pa'i gzi brjid 'chang ba/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i sku/ dbang po dang / nye dga' bo klu'i rgyal pos
se ral du byas pa/ tak+Sha ka klu'i rgyal pos sked cings su bcings pa/ gzugs brnyan sna tshogs dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma 'dzin cing kun tu
'bar ba'i sku/ snang bar byed cing zhal rab tu bzhad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snyams pa'i yid kyis 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las lang
te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mchod pa byed pa ni/ thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog
sna tshogs pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / ut+pa la mthing ka dang / so'u gan+d+hi dang / bar shi ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po la sogs pa'i
me tog thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sbyin
grangs med pa'i 'khor chen po 'dus par gyur to/ /sha chen po za ba dang / mi'i lus za ba'i gnod sbyin dang / 'bar ba dang / sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa mang po
'dus te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'bar ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi
ma yin pa sna tshogs pa 'dus par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig 'dzin chen po'i 'khor dang / drang srong chen po'i tshogs kyi 'khor de dag kyang 'dus par gyur/ byang
chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po yang lhags te thog ma'i ngo mtshar brjid par mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ gang rig pa bshad par dgongs pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis
bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ dus 'di'i tshe bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ngal bso po'i rgyal po chen po la dbugs phyung nas gnod sbyin 'dul
ba kun tu 'bar ba'i 'od zer chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan
'das kyi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs byung ste gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyis snang bar byas nas 'dus pa'i gnod sbyin dang / 'bar
ba dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / gza' dang / brjed byed thams cad la bskul nas gdug pa'i klu dang klu thams cad la bskul nas slar 'ongs te
bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bzhad de/ bzhad pa des 'od zer sna bdun zhal gyi
sgo nas byung ste rnam thos kyi bu'i sras gar mkhan mchog gi spyi bor zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od de der zhugs ma thag tu gar mkhan mchog gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rang
gi gzugs snang bar gyur te/ gnod sbyin rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i gad mo cher stong pa'i sku/ 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ sku chen po phyag stong
pa'i ri rab ltar gnas pa'i sku/ sa rab tu g.yo zhing stobs chen po rnam par gnon pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin cing 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ mi'i thod pa'i phreng ba
bcings la/ mi mgo khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin pa'i phyag /stag lpags kyi stod g.yogs byas pa/ seng+ge'i 'gros ltar grags pa de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar 'ongs
nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying pa mchis te/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa
dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams nye bar dgug pa dang / klu rnams rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gza' thams cad rab tu 'joms par
byed pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / mthu bo ches phyag byas pa/ rig 'dzin thams cad kyi sgrub pa brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste/ bcom ldan
'das| bdag gis 'khor chen po lhags pa'i mdun du rab tu brjod par 'tshal na/ rig 'dzin thams cad grub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs
pa'i phyir kun tu brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur zhing / lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis kyang rig pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rab tu 'byin par byed cing / dkyil 'khor
thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs nas dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / ba lang gi rigs
dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dngos grub ster ba/ dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgyas thams cad
'jug par byed pa/ gzungs chen po'i sngags kyi le'u rjes su ster ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ chung du na lan gcig rjes su dran pas kyang dngos grub thams cad rjes
su ster bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs thams cad kyi spyi bor dbang bskur du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la brtse bar dgongs te phyag rgya chen
po'i dkyil 'khor dang / le'u dang | sngags kyi dngos grub rjes su stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas gar mkhan mchog gnod
sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gzungs sngags grub par gnas byin gyis brlab kyi/ rig
'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi bdag po sgrogs shig /de nas gar mkhan mchog gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di smras so/ /A R+ya narta ku be ra/ mu la man+t+ra man+t+ra/

oM A thA to dz+wA li ta/ hUM ta b+ha ho ta ta bta/ ka na ka ma Ni/ shI la to ba ha sa kA /ma Ni pra la m+ba ha ra ar+d+ha ha ri/ tsi t+ta ha ri tA la ts+tshan+d+ra na/ a ka ru/ du ru ska/ saM kri ta sa ta/ ma hA ru

maM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ wa ra gam+b+hi ra d+hi ri/ a su rA ga Na/ ni yu na da man+d+ha ra da sha d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra gam+b+hI ra/ d+hi ra/ phi ra phi ra/ ma phi ra ma phi ra/ a su ra ga Na ni/ su d+ha na ma d+ha naM/ ta dz+dza
ni| bi yu mi ga /a d+ha ra a ti ga ti ra Na/ pra b+hA a nu ra tsi ti/ maN+Dal na/ ka pA la mA la/ a b+ha ba d+h+wa dzA ti/ ha sa ku la na/ ni rma laM/ saM bu laM/ sA ga ra su me ru pa ra pa ta/
ta ri ta rang+ga sa shi kha ra d+hA tu she la pa ta/ na ga raM/ a mo g+ha da sha A di t+ya/ maN+Dal na/ sha shi/ ki raM mo li d+ha raM/ sha shi ki raM mo li d+ha raM/ tsa

la tsi ma la/ sa ga la/ dz+yo na kr-i ta/ a ba b+hA saM ku laM/ pra ma tha naM/ a su ra b+ha ba na/ ku la nA sha naM/ brah+men+d+ra/ ru dra na ma kr-i taM/ nA kr-i taM/ pU dza taM/ sarba bi d+yA d+ha ra na ma skr-i

taM| shi ra bi sid+d+ha ya sha /gan+d+ha rA ba su tsi taM/ mahA me ru maN+Da la na/ kuN+Da la d+harma/ wa ra yang myos bi dwa d+harma/ b+huny+dza ka ta k+Sha ka bA su ki /sA ga ra/ naM To pa naM ta/ ga la
ka b+ho la me kha lA laM kri ta/ ga ti d+yod hr-i da ga pA la mA laM/ a laM kr-i ta/ sha ri ra/ shrI pra dz+wa li ta mo ri ta raM/ A yur b+ha ban be ga dza/ bka tsa tu rang+ga tsakra tsa ra NaM/ a
pra me ya ba ra/ badzra mu sid+d+hi khad ta ka to mA ra ya/ pa ra shu pA shA tsa kra/ a si tri shU la/ mud ga ra/ pra ha ra Nan/ ma ra ku pa ra raM/ wa ra ku pa raM/ su ren dran/ su pe shaM/

su bAka tra kraM /su gu h+ya kraM /sid se na sa ni na ra ku pa ra/ pa raM taM yi Sh+ya mi/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ na ra ku pa ra/ ku pa ra/ ha sa ha sa/ tu ru tu ru/ tsi ti tsi ti/ bi tsa ti/ bi tsa ti/
badzra badzra tsa badzra badzra/ ha ra ha ra/ hu ru hu ru/ ha na ha na/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ bi dra ba ya/ u ta sA da ya/ u pa da ya/ u pa ra ya/ na ra ku pa ra/ wa ra ku pa ra/ shu pa ku pa ra

yak+Sha ku pa ra/ g+hu ha ku pa ra/ ma d+ha ma d+ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ tar+dz+dza tar+dz+dza/ nar+tsha nar+tsha/ ha ri ha ri/ ha ri lo tsa ni/ ni la lo tsa na/ tI pya lo ts+tsha na/ su wa ra Na lo tsa na/ me g+ha g+ho Shod b+ha ba/ ha la
ha la| shab+da ga Na/ kA nA pa ya/ he he he he/ na ra ka ku pa ra/ he na raM ku pa ra ku pa ra/ wa ra ku pa ra/ A bi sha A bi sha/ su ku ba ra ku ba ra/ wa ku ba ra/ tsa la tsa la/ mo li d+ha tsa la

ya wardza/ la gu la gu/ ku ru ku ru/ a da twa da sha gu laM/ ku la ku la/ ki la ki la/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+dzu muny+tsa/ shab+da ku laM/ na ra mung+ga raM/ ku ba ra/ pha ra ba ra ba ra/ badzra d+ha ra/ pad+ma

d+ha ra| mu sa la d+ha ra/ tsakra d+ha ra/ lang+ga d+ha ra/ pa ra shU d+ha ra/ a yo mu sa la/ trA sa na ka ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra tsan+d+ra/ sUR+ya mA la d+ha ra/ nak+Sha ta/ nA k+Sha tra gra ha maN+Da la dra

ha sha a byid ta dz+wa la te/ dza ka ra/ sa g+ha ra sa ra bi sho sha na ka ra mad sa mad ka ra/ shi shu mar khi ta pA sha d+ha ra/ a su ra ga Na nAM/ marda na ka ra/ khuM ban+d+ha ra yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa/
hr-i da yod mA da na kha raM/ staM b+ha ga wA na/ na ra ku pa ra/ wa ra ku pa ra/ nar+tsha nar+tsha/ ha ra ha ri ha ri/ hA ri lo tsa nA swAhA/ gar mkhan mchog gi rigs pa dang po 'di las stong byed
do| |sprin bskrad pa la mtshon cha'am/ kA ra bI ra'i lcug ma 'am/ bal po se'u'i lcug ma'am/ thal bas bya'o/ /rma bya'i lcug mas byab pa'i nang du sprin byab pa ltar byabs te
char dbab pa'i dus na pog gis bdugs na char 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig bzlas pas 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gza' dang / 'bar
ba dang / gdon la gdab pa ni/ gu gul gyi dul bas lan gcig bzlas pas 'bab par 'gyur/ thams cad ston cing gang dris pa de smra bar 'gyur ro/ /gu gul la lan gcig
bzlas te bdug pas 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'bar ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
dang / 'bar ba mo dang / sha za mo la sogs pa la gu gul lan gcig bzlas te bdugs pas thams cad 'gugs shing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /lhag chad ston par byed do/ /
gu gul la lan gcig bzlas te bdugs na/ yul nas skrod par 'gyur/ mar dang yungs kar gyis kha zas bcos pa rnams gar 'dod pa der 'pho/ /'khur mkhan gyi
khang par sngags rjes su dran par byas te gu gul gyis bdugs na 'khur ba thams cad gang 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nad thams cad gzhig pa dang / bdag
srung ba la yungs kar dang / thal ba dang / ba'i chu la lan gcig bsngags nas gu gul gyis gdugs te srung ba'i skud pa 'gul bar bcings na/ 'jigs pa dang / nad
thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nad gzhan la gtong par 'dod na/ gu gul la lan gcig bzlas te bdugs na/ de ma thag tu 'gro ba stong yang rims kyis btab
par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi pa'i rims gtong par 'dod na/ ba lang gi sha dang gu gul gcig tu bsres la zhag bdun bzlas te lan bdun
bsregs na/ gang gi ming bzung ba de rims kyis btab par 'gyur ro/ /gu gul la lan bdun bzlas te bsregs na/ slar sos par 'gyur ro/ /gu gul la lan bdun
bzlas ta gang gi ming dang bcas pa mer bcug na/ gang dang gang gi ming bzung ba gzas bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /thal bas thig le byas te spyi gtsug byas pa bcings te bzlas
na| grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'dod na/ skud pa nag po 'am 'jag ma la lan gcig bzlas pas zhi'o/ /gang cung zad bya ba thams cad la gu gul
la lan gcig bzlas pas byed par 'gyur ro/ /gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa las/ las mang po pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ma Na s+ya/

mahA rA dza s+ya/ na ra ku pa ra s+ya/ gu h+ya kAn+ta pa ti/ mA brta yi Sh+yA mi/ a nu rA pa su rU pa/ na ra ku pa ra tsan+d+ra/ khan na tsa ka na/ he ma hA sa kan/ na ra ku par/ he ma ka na/ ku ha kan/ tsan
la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa/ phu lu phu lu/ ku pa ra swAhA/ gcig tu dpa' ba 'bar ba rnams 'dul zhing las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed pa dngos grub
kyi las thams cad dang / bla na med pa'i dgongs pa thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bskrad par bya bar 'dod na/ seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad
pa'i tshad du byas te lan gcig yongs su bzlas nas gang gi sgor btab pa de de ma thag tu skrod par 'gyur ro/ /phur pa phyung na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar la lan
nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te dgra bo'i khyim du gtor na/ de ma thag tu 'khyams par 'gyur ro/ /gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdugs na/ grol bar
'gyur ro/ /'khyams par bya bar 'dod na/ mi rus las phur pa sor brgyad pa'i tshad du byas te/ lan gcig yongs su bzlas nas gu gul gyis bdugs te sgo drung du
btab na/ zhag gsum gyi thams cad dang bcas te 'khyams par 'gyur ro/ /tho ba byas nas lan gcig yongs su bzlas nas gang gi ming bzung ste sa 'og tu tho bas
brdegs na/ de'i lus dum bu dum bur zhig par 'gyur ro/ /phyung na thar ro/ /dur khrod du gang gi ming bzung ste bcug na 'byung po chen pos zin te/ phyung na thar par
'gyur ro/ /khang stong du gang gis ming gzung ste bcug na/ de sha zas zin te/ phyung na thar ro/ /lha khang du sa brkos te bcug na/ de lha chen pos zin par 'gyur te/ phyung na thar ro/ /
tshal du gang gi ming bzung ste sa brkos te bcug na/ gang gi gnyen dang / 'khor dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / khyim thams cad spangs nas thams cad du 'bros par 'gyur te/ ji ltar
ri dwags bzhin du nags su spyod par 'gyur te/ phyung na thar ro/ /thams cad gu gul la lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te tho ba la
lan gcig bzlas te gu gul gyis bdug cing tho ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag na/ gnod sbyin dang / 'bar ba dang / 'bar ba mo dang / gnod sbyin pho mo rnams du zhing
phyogs phyogs su 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gzugs brnyan byas pa'am/ yang na bris pa la lan gcig bzlas te gu gul gyis bdugs na/ gnod sbyin dang / 'bar ba dang /
gnod sbyin pho mo rnams gnas shing dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gter thams cad ston cing 'gugs par yang byed do/ /ngal bso ba'i gzugs brnyan byas pa'am/
bris pa la gu gul gyis bdugs shing sngags brjod nas bsdigs nas tho bas brdegs ma thag tu du zhing 'ongs te mchog thams cad dang / 'bru dang nor thams cad ji ltar bde
bar 'bul bar byed do/ /gar mkhan mchog 'di ltar byas na/ de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /ngal bso po rkang pas mnan cing gu gul gyi bdugs nas
sngags lan bdun rjes su dran par byas na/ de ste myur du ma 'ongs na mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dang thal ba bsres te lan bdun yongs su bzlas
nas spyi bor bzhag la gu gul gyis bdug cing sngags rjes su dran par byas na/ ngal bso po gnod sbyin stong dang bcas ba de nor dang bcas pa mdun du 'ongs nas las
thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mthu bo che rkang pas mnan te gu gul gyis bdug cing sngags bzlas na/ gzugs g.yo bar gyur te/ yungs kar gyis
brdegs na chig smra zhing chos thams cad sbyin par byed/ mdun du bkug ste bka' thams cad nyan nas dgos pa thams cad sgrub cing /spyad thams cad kyi dngos grub
thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /mi'i thod pa la lan bdun yongs su bzlas pa'i yungs dkar thod pa'i nang du bcug ste drag po'i sgor bcings na/ ji srid drag po'i sgo der
thod pa gnas kyi bar de srid du dgos pa thams cad sgrub cing mchog thams cad ster ba nas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ gu gul gyis bdugs te sngags rjes su dran
par byas na/ tshig smra zhing bya ba thams cad byed cing mchog thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa rkang pas mnan te gu gul gyis bdugs nas sngags brjod de 'o ma dang zhos bskrus
na| tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du bkug ste gsang sngags kyi spyad dang dngos grub thams cad rjes su ster bar 'gyur ro/ /khrus byas pa'i 'o ma de 'bras mkhar ma'i
zan dang bsres te zos na/ thos pa'i rgyud thams cad kha ton nus shing / spyad thams cad kyi sngags kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa thams cad chus ma zos par
gyur nas mi'am ci dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang ldan par 'gyur nas lus thams cad dag par rnyed nas tshe lo stong du 'gyur zhing / dkyil cing 'khyil ba'i sgra dang ldan
par gyur nas rkang pa gnyis la bzung ste phyag btsal nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan dur khrod kyi dbus su sa brkos te bcug na/ 'byung po thams
cad kyi rnam par gtses par 'gyur zhing lus dum bur zhig par 'gyur ro/ /mig gi 'bras bu rdol te zla ba gsum na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gzugs brnyan byas te dkyil
'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas me tog dang bdug pa thams cad phul nas ka ra bI rI lcug ma la yongs su bzlas te sngags rjes su dran par byas te bzhugs na/ klu thams
cad 'ong ste char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed do/ /klu thams cad las byed bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyis bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur
ro| |klu'i gzugs brnyan byas te bal po se'u'i lcugs mas bzhus na/ ser ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rlung thams cad yongs su bcings pa la stan 'jam po la
yongs su bzlas te khang pa mthon po'i khar 'dug na/ rlung thams cad 'ching bar byas par 'gyur ro/ mi'i thod pa bzung ste kA ra bI ra'i lcug mas dgra bo'i ming bzung
nas bzhus na/ las thams cad la lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis grub par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa las/ las thams cad pa'i
cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //na mo bai shra ma Na su tA ya di bya bi mA na tsi ri ti ya/ he ma a la kuN+Da la sha rI rA ya/ yak+Sha rak+Sha sa ban+ti d+ha ya/ taM b+ha ga nan/ mA
brta yi Sh+ya mi/ tad+ya thA/ ba ni ba ni/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ ku ku ku ku/ pa ra pa ra/ ku pa ra ku pa ra/ na ra ku pa ra/ di bya bi mya ni ku ta li/ tu ti tu ti swAhA/ de nas gnod
sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo srung bar 'dod na/ wa de'i shing las spang leb tu byas te gnod sbyin mo bri bar bya ste/ kha dog sngo bsangs la gdong khro gnyer can mche ba
'khyil pa stod g.yogs med pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na mi'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin ma ste/ de'i
mdun na rig pa brgya stong bzlas shing zas dkar po bza' bar bya/ brgya stong rdzogs pa dang gnod sbyin mo mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la gtor ma dkar po dang / yon chu sbyin no//
des smras pa/ ci bgyi ba bka' stsol cig ces bgyis pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa smra bar bya ba nga'i chung ma'o zhes pa dang / de de bzhin no zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de
nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med 'ongs nas de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lhan cig tu rol cing / spyod pa la dga' bas rtse'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa de gnod sbyin chen
po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der 'gro zhing nam mkhar spyod de/ tshe lo lnga stong thub bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mngon par spyod par 'dod pas byed pa
bslang pa ni/ gos chen po bgos te/ stag gi pags pas smad dkris la dur khrod kyi dbus su ci 'byor pa'i khrag gi sbyin sreg zhag bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du
bsregs na/ bud med seng+ge la zhon pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ dril bu dang / dgra sta dang / mu sa la dang / lag na tri shU la thogs pas mdun du 'ongs nas des smras pa/ rig pa 'dzin
pa de bkres so zhes pa dang / gtor ma 'di gar mkhan mchog gi bka' ste/ ji ltar bde bar spyod cig ces nas de nas yon chab sbyin par bya/ des smras
pa| ci slong zhes pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pas smra bar bya ste/ nga'i las thams cad byos shig ces so/ /des smras pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa de bzhin no/ /zhes nas gang dgos
par 'gyur ba de thams cad dang / gter thams cad kyang ston no/ /de nas a tsa na bsku bar 'dod na/ ldong ros dmar po mi mgo gsher ba'i nang du khrag dang bsres nas
bcug nas sngags lan brgyad kyis yongs su bzlas te kA ra bI ra'i lcug mas dgug par bya'o/ /de nas mi mgo 'bar bar 'gyur te/ des thig le byas na/ nam mkha'
la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa dang thabs cig tu rol par 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le byas na/ mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gang du 'dod pa de dang der zhugs par
'gyur/ mig la bskus na/ gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur zhing lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas thams cad mthong
ba dang / kun tu 'gro ba thams cad dang rol cing dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /bros na/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du 'tsho zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar
gyur nas skra 'khyil cing 'khyil ba/ mi'am ci dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nyung rum bya bar 'dod na/ dur khrod kyi thal ba la gzugs byas te seng
ldang gi phur pa la lan bdun bzlas nas snying ga'i gnas su btab na/ nyung rum du 'gyur te/ phyung na thar ro/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes bcu bzhi la dur khrod du zhugs nas
sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par byas nas an dza na blangs shing sa bi ra dang lhan cig tu bsres te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te mig la bskus na
skal pa'i mchog dang / gzi brjid dang ldan zhing gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten kun dang mdza' zhing thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /go ro tsan la lan
nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te thig le byas na/ skal pa mchog dang / dgos pa thams cad sgrub cing bud med kun la dbang bar gyur nas 'gro ba thams cad mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ /zos
na| rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa'i chus gdong bkrus ni/ khros pa'i rgyal po yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa kun dang mdza' zhing 'dzin
pa'i dag tu 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang gu gul gyi dud pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa las/ mig sman dang / go ro tsa na dang / gnod
sbyin mo sgrub pa'i le'u gsum pa'o// //'di man chad gar mkhan mchog gnod sbyin chen po'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad bar
bya'o| |grub pa'i lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang pos mchod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin
gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ drang srong thams cad kyis bstod pa/ gnod sbyin dang 'bar ba thams cad kyis dam tshig pa/
dpyad thams cad dang / rig pa thams cad thob pa'o/ /de nas gnas gtsang mar grub pa'i mtshan ma brtag go /de nas rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mar byas te rab tu
khrus byas nas gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te kha zas dkar bo bza' zhing rtag tu bzlas pa la brtson par bya'o/ /dkar po'i phyogs la skar ma dang / gza'
dang / mjug ring bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i nyi ma der brtags te ba kham pa mo'i lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus te khru bcu gnyis pa rim pa gsum
du dkyil 'khor yang rab tu bya'o/ /kun tu thig bri ba ni/ shin tu mnyan par bcal te gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba cha mnyam par gcal bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi khru brgyad
pa'i tshad la tsan+dan dkar pos legs par bri bar bya'o/ /nang gi khru bzhi'i tshad la gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / ga pur dang bsres bas bri bar bya'o/ /de'i dbus su gar mkhan mchog
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa bcu drug pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang po chen po dang /
